      (if (empty? targets) current-tree
        (recur (rest targets) (upshift (first targets) current-tree))))))

        parent (or (f (partial mapcat (fn [[h & r]] (map (fn [c] {c h}) (map first r))))) {})
        under (fn un [node c] `(~node ~@(map #(un % c) (c node))))
        repar (fn rep [node c p]

(fn reparen
  [element tree]
  (letfn [(pull
            [tree index]
            (let [[head & children] tree
                  [first-children rest-children] (split-at index children)
                  [[[child-head & child-children]] last-children] (split-at 1 rest-children)]
              `(~child-head ~@child-children (~head ~@first-children ~@last-children))))
          (finds
            [[head & children] element]
            (cond (= element head) '()
                  :else (if-let [rec-find (some identity
                                                (map-indexed (fn [index child]
                                                               (if-let [rec-find (finds child element)]
                                                                 (cons index rec-find)))
                                                             children))]
                          rec-find
                          nil)))
]
      (reduce pull tree (finds tree element))))

(fn [name tree]
  (let [
  search-impl (fn search-impl [target path [name & children :as node]]
    (let [next-path (cons node path)]
      (if (= target name)
        next-path
        (some #(search-impl target next-path %) children))))
  search (fn [target tree]
    (search-impl target '() tree))
  name-of (fn [[name & _ :as node]]
    name)
  remove-from (fn [[subject-name & children :as subject]
                   [target-name & _ :as target]]
    (if (nil? target)
      subject
      (let [children* (filter #(not (= target-name (name-of %))) children)]
        (cons subject-name children*))))
  append-to (fn [subject new-child]
    (concat subject [new-child]))
  transform-impl (fn transform-impl [former-child [node & ancestory]]
    (let [node* (remove-from node former-child)]
      (if (seq ancestory)
        (append-to node* (transform-impl node ancestory))
        node*)))
  transform (fn [path]
    (transform-impl nil path))
  ]
  (->> (search name tree)
       transform)))

                                    b (seq res)
                                    f (first res)
                                    h (-> f first first)]
                                (when b (cons (cons n (filter #(not= h (first %)) l)) f)))))]
                 (reduce #(conj (vec %2) %) (w2 sym tree))))

(fn f [n t]
    (letfn [(parent [[r & s :as tree] n]
              (or (if (some #(= n (first %)) s) tree
                                                (some #(parent % n) s)
                                                )))
            (subtree [[r & s :as tree] n]
              (cond
                (not (seq tree)) nil
                (= r n) tree
                :esle (loop [x s]
                        (if (not (seq x)) nil
                                          (or (subtree (first x) n) (recur (rest x)))))
                )
              )
            (removesub [[r & s :as tree] n]
              (if (= r n) nil
                          (cons r (for [x s :when (not= (first x) n)]
                                    (removesub x n)
                                    ))
                          )
              )]

      (let [s (subtree t n) p (parent t n)]
        (if (not (seq p)) s
                          (conj (vec s) (f (first p) (removesub t n)))))
      
      ))

(fn reparenting [node tree]
  (letfn [(find-subtree [tree]
                        (let [root (nth tree 0 nil)
                              left (nth tree 1 nil)
                              right (nth tree 2 nil)]
                          (cond
                            (nil? root) nil
                            (= root node) tree
                            :else (or (find-subtree left)
                                      (find-subtree right)))))
          (get-parent [[root left right]]
                      (cond
                        (or (nil? root) (= node (first left)) (= node (first right))) root
                        :else (or (get-parent left) (get-parent right))))
          (get-parent-tree [node [root & children]]
                           (if (nil? root) 
                             nil
                             (concat (list root) (for [child children :when (not= node (first child))] (get-parent-tree node child)))))]
    (let [p (get-parent tree)
          q (get-parent-tree node tree)
          t (find-subtree tree)]
      (if (nil? p) tree
        (concat t (list (reparenting p q)) )))))

(fn puzzle [new-root tree]
  (letfn [(paths [tree]
                 (let [[root & branches] tree]
                   (if (empty? branches) (list (list root))
                     (mapcat (fn [branch] (map #(cons root %) (paths branch))) branches))))
          (find-path [node tree]
                     (let [[pre-path post-path] (split-with #(not= node %) (some #(if (some #{node} %) %) (paths tree)))]
                       (conj (vec pre-path) (first post-path))))
          (transform-1 [new-root tree]
                       (let [[root & branches] tree
                             new-sub-branches (remove #(= new-root (first %)) branches)
                             [new-root & new-childs] (first (filter #(= new-root (first %)) branches))]
                         (list* new-root (concat new-childs (list (list* root new-sub-branches))))))]
    (let [path (find-path new-root tree)]
      (loop [roots (rest path)
             tree tree]
        (if (empty? roots) tree
          (recur (rest roots) (transform-1 (first roots) tree)))))))

           (if (= node parent)
             [root path]

                    children
                    (reductions conj [] children)
                    (rest (iterate rest children)))
               (some identity))))
         [] tree)]
    (if (empty? path)
      root
      (->> (reduce
             #(cons (%2 0) (conj (%2 1) %))
             (cons (head 0) (head 1))
             tail)
        vector
        (concat root)))))

                             (recur s_two parent point)))))
          t (fn re [n stm]
                (if (coll? (stm n))
                  (concat `(~n)
                    (map #(re % stm) (stm n)) )
                  `(~n)))

          ]
      (->> ( tomap rot cnodes) (reparent target rot) (t target) )))

            [tree node]

(fn tree-reparent [new-root tree]
    (letfn [(separate-each-from-others [elements]
              (loop [res []
                     prevs []
                     todo elements]
                (if (empty? todo)
                  res
                  (recur
                    (conj res [(first todo) (concat prevs (rest todo))])
                    (conj prevs (first todo))
                    (rest todo)))))
            (reparent [new-root-node tree childable-parent]
              (if (nil? tree)
                nil
                (let [node (first tree)
                      children (drop 1 tree)]
                  (if (= node new-root-node)
                    (filter
                      #(not (nil? %))
                      (concat (list node) children (list childable-parent)))
                    (some
                      (fn [[child other-children]]
                        (reparent
                          new-root-node
                          child
                          (filter #(not (nil? %))
                            (concat (list node) other-children (list childable-parent)))))
                      (separate-each-from-others children))))))]
      (reparent new-root tree nil) )
    )

(letfn [(is-named? [t x]
          (= x (first t)))

        (add-child [t child]
          (concat t [child]))

        (remove-child [t x]
          (concat (take 1 t) (filter (complement #(is-named? % x)) (rest t))))

        (get-child [t x]
          (first (filter #(is-named? % x) (rest t))))

        (get-children [t]
          (rest t))

        (path-to [t x]
          (loop [stack [[t []]]]
            (when (seq stack)
              (let [[current path] (peek stack)
                    stack (pop stack)
                    path (conj path (first current))]
                (if (= x (last path))
                  path
                  (recur (->> current
                              get-children
                              (map (fn [child] [child path]))
                              (into stack))))))))

        (make-child-parent [t x]
          (when-let [new-parent (get-child t x)]
            (let [old-parent (remove-child t x)
                  new-parent (add-child new-parent old-parent)]
              new-parent)))

        (reparent* [t x path]
          (if-not (seq path)
            t
            (recur (make-child-parent t (first path))
                   x
                   (rest path))))

        (reparent [x t]
          (let [path (path-to t x)
                ;; reparent* expects the path to start with the first child, not the
                ;; root of the tree, so we drop the first element of the path.
                path (rest path)]
            (reparent* t x path)))]
  reparent)

(fn [x t]
  (let [srch (fn srch [x t]
               (when (coll? t)
                 (if (= x (first t))
                   (list)
                   (loop [ys (rest t)]
                     (when (seq ys)
                       (let [y (first ys)
                             z (srch x y)]
                         (if z
                           (cons y z)
                           (recur (rest ys)))))))))
        step (fn [x t]
               (let [r (filter #(not= % x) t)]
                 (cons (first x) (concat (rest x) (list r)))))]
    (loop [rl t
           ys (srch x t)]
      (if (seq ys)
        (recur (step (first ys) rl) (rest ys))
        rl))))

(fn bah [target tree]
  (letfn [(to-map-step [parent [key & children] m]
            (let [node [key {:parents (if parent [parent] [])
                             :children (map first children)}]]
              (if (seq children)
                  (apply merge (conj m node) (map #(to-map-step key % m) children))
                  (conj m node))))
          (swap-positions [target graph]
            (if (empty? ((graph target) :parents)) 
                graph
                (let [parent-node (first ((graph target) :parents))
                      modified-parent (assoc (graph parent-node)
                                             :parents (cons target ((graph parent-node) :parents))
                                             :children (remove #{target} ((graph parent-node) :children)))
                      modified-target (assoc (graph target)
                                             :parents []
                                             :children (conj (into [] ((graph target) :children)) parent-node))]
                  (assoc graph parent-node modified-parent target modified-target))))
          (pull-down [graph]
            (if-let [multiparent (first (filter #(> (count ((second %) :parents)) 1) graph))]
              (let [push-node-key (second (:parents (second multiparent)))
                    push-node (graph push-node-key)
                    modified-multiparent 
                      (assoc (graph (first multiparent))
                             :parents [(first ((graph (first multiparent)) :parents))]
                             :children (conj (into [] ((graph (first multiparent)) :children)) 
                                             push-node-key))
                    modified-push-node
                      (assoc push-node
                             :parents [(first multiparent)]
                             :children (remove #{(first multiparent)} (push-node :children)))]
                (assoc graph (first multiparent) modified-multiparent push-node-key modified-push-node))
              graph))
          (to-list [m]
            (letfn [(convert-node [key]
                      (let [{children :children} (m key)]
                        (if (seq children)
                            (cons key (map #(convert-node %) children))
                            [key])))]
              (convert-node (ffirst (filter #(empty? ((second %) :parents)) m)))))]
    (->> (to-map-step nil tree {}) 
         (swap-positions target)
         (pull-down)
         (to-list))))

(fn [s t]
  (letfn [(tree [t ls] (cons t ls))
  				(value [t] (first t))
					(leaves [t] (rest t))
					(add-leave [t & l] (concat t l))
					(remove-leave [t s] (tree (value t) (remove #(= s (value %)) (leaves t))))
					(get-leave [[l & ls] s] (cond (= s (value l)) l (empty? ls) nil :else (get-leave ls s)))
					(pull-leave [t s] (add-leave (get-leave (leaves t) s) (remove-leave t s)))
					(find-path [[v & ls] s res]
					  (cond 
					    (= s v) res
					    (= 0 (count ls)) nil
					    :else (first (remove nil? (map #(find-path % s (conj res (first %))) ls)))))]
         (reduce pull-leave t (find-path t s []))))

          (rb [a b]
                (concat [(first b)] (rest b) (filter #(not (empty? %)) [(remove #(= b %) a)]) ))

  (let [p (fp n t)]

    )

(fn __ [node tree]
  (let [strip (fn [xs] (filter #(not (and (seq? %) (empty? %))) xs))
        rm (fn rm [tree]
             (let [h (first tree)
                   cs (rest tree)]
               (if (or (nil? h) (= h node))
                 '()
                 (->> cs
                      (map #(rm %))
                      strip
                      (cons h)
                      strip))))
        split (fn [tree]
                (let [hlp (fn hlp [[h & ts :as tr] parent]
                            (cond (nil? h) nil
                                  (= node h) [tr parent]
                                  :else (first (filter identity (map #(hlp % h) ts)))))]
          
                  (hlp tree nil)))
        [sub parent] (split tree)
        res (rm tree)
        new (if (empty? res) '() (list  (__ parent res)))]
    (concat sub new)))

(fn lift [label tree] (letfn [(get-label [x]

                                       ([path label tree] (let [lbl (get-label tree)

                                                            (if (= label lbl)

                                                                      (rest tree))))) )
                              (lift-local [tree label] (let [match  #(= label (get-label %))
                                                             subtree     (first (filter match tree)) 
                                                             but-subtree (remove match tree)]

(fn uproot [newroot tree] 
  (letfn [(get-child [x] (when (sequential? x) (first x)))
          (path-to
            ([child tree] (path-to [] child tree))
            ([path child tree]
              (let [c (get-child tree) 
                    path (conj path c)]
                (if (= child c)
                  path
                  (mapcat (partial path-to path child)
                          (rest tree))))))
          (lift [tree child]
                      (let [match      #(= child (get-child %))
                            subtree     (first (filter match tree))
                            but-subtree (remove match tree)]
                        (concat subtree (list but-subtree))))] 
    (reduce lift
          tree
          (rest (path-to newroot tree)))))

(fn reparent-tree [n t]
  (letfn [(tree-graph [[r & c] parent]
            (apply merge {r (into (mapv first c) (when parent [parent]))} 
                   (map #(tree-graph % r) c)))
          (traverse [g seen n]
            (let [seen (conj seen n) children (remove seen (g n))]
              (apply list n (map (partial traverse g seen) children))))]
    (traverse (tree-graph t nil) #{} n)))

(fn reparent
 ([root tree]
  (if (= (first tree) root)
   tree
   (reparent root tree '())))
 ([root tree past]
  (if (= (first tree) root)
   (concat tree [past])
   (some identity
    (for [i (range 1 (count tree))]
     (reparent
      root
      (nth tree i)
      (if (empty? past)
       (concat (take i tree) (drop (inc i) tree))
       (concat (take i tree) (drop (inc i) tree) [past]))))))))

(fn reparent
  ([nd tr] (reparent nd tr []))
  ([nd t1 t2]
            (if (= (first t1) nd)
              (if (empty? t2) t1 (conj (vec t1) t2))
              (loop [c (rest t1)]
                (if (empty? c)
                  nil
                  (let [t (first c)
                        c1 (for [e t1 :when(not= e t)] e)
                        r (reparent nd t (if (empty? t2) c1 (conj (vec c1) t2)))]
                    (if (nil? r)
                      (recur (rest c))
                      r)))))))

(fn [node tree]
  (letfn [(parent []
            (letfn [(p [[head & children]]
                      (when head
                        (if (some (partial = node)
                                  (map first children))
                          (cons head nil)
                          (mapcat p children))))]
              (first (p tree))))
          (detach-subtree [node tree]
            (letfn [(detach [[head & nodes]]
                      (when (and head
                                 (not= head node))
                        (->> nodes
                             (map detach)
                             (filter (complement nil?))
                             (cons head))))
                    (subtree []
                      (first
                        (drop-while
                          (comp (partial not= node) first)
                          (tree-seq seq? rest tree))))]
              [(detach tree)
               (subtree)])) ]
    (let [p (parent)]
      (if-not p
        (list node)
        (let [[a b] (detach-subtree p tree)
              [b c] (detach-subtree node b)
              b (if a (concat b [a]) b)]
          (concat c [b])))
      )))

(fn f
  ([x t] (f x t nil))
  ([x [a & cs :as t] p]
    (if (= x a)
      (concat t p)
      (when (seq cs)
        (loop [l []
               c (first cs)
               r (rest cs)]
          (if-let [s (f x c (list (cons a (concat l r p))))]
            s
            (when (seq r)
              (recur (conj l c) (first r) (rest r)))))))))

(fn [e [h & r :as y]]
  (let [has? #((set (flatten %)) e)]
    (if (= h e) y (recur e `(~@(first (filter has? r)) (~h ~@(remove has? r)))))))

(fn func [target graph]
	(let [remove-node 	(fn remove-node [graph target]
							(cons (first graph) (remove #(= target (first %)) (map #(remove-node % target) (next graph)))))
			select-node (fn select-node [graph target]
							(cond (= target (first graph)) graph
							      :else (some #(select-node % target) (next graph))))
			get-parent	(fn get-parent [graph target]
							(cond (= 1 (count graph)) nil 
								  (some #(= target (first %)) (next graph)) (first graph)
								  :else (some #(get-parent % target) (next graph))))
		  new-root 		(select-node graph target)
		  parent 		(get-parent graph target)]
		(if (nil? parent) new-root
				(concat new-root (list (func  parent (remove-node graph target)))))))

(fn tree-reparenting [node tree]  
   (let [get-parent-children-new-root
           (fn [n t]
             (loop [previous-parent nil
                    rem-tree t]
               (cond
                 (= n (first rem-tree)) (list previous-parent (rest rem-tree))
                 (some #(= n %) (flatten (second rem-tree))) (recur (first rem-tree) (second rem-tree))
                 :else (recur previous-parent (conj (rest (rest rem-tree)) (first rem-tree))))))
         get-parent-n (fn [n t]
                               (first (get-parent-children-new-root n t)))
         get-children-n (fn [n t]
                               (second (get-parent-children-new-root n t)))

  new-tree-unedited

     (loop
       [acc (list node)
        current-node node
        counter 0
        used-nodes #{node nil}]
       (if (or (= current-node nil)
               (= counter 3))
         acc
         (recur (remove #(= % (list nil))
                        (concat acc
                        (filter #(= (set (list)) (clojure.set/intersection used-nodes (set (flatten %))))
                                (get-children-n current-node tree))
                        (list (list (get-parent-n current-node tree)))
                        ))
                (get-parent-n current-node tree)
                (inc counter)
                (clojure.set/union used-nodes (set (flatten acc))))))]

      (loop [acc new-tree-unedited
             position (dec (count acc))
             temp-counter 0]
        (if (or (= 2 temp-counter)
              (= (count acc)
               (inc (count (remove #(= % (list nil)) (concat (get-children-n node tree) (list (list (get-parent-n node tree)))))))))
          acc
          (if (some #(= % (first (nth acc (dec position)))) 
                (conj (map first (get-children-n (first (nth acc position)) tree)) (get-parent-n (first (nth acc position)) tree)))
            (let [intermediate-tree
                   (concat (take (dec position) acc) (list (concat (nth acc (dec position)) (drop position acc))))]
              (recur intermediate-tree (dec (count intermediate-tree)) (inc temp-counter)))
            (recur acc (dec position) temp-counter)))
)
     

     
     ))

(fn [v tree]
  (letfn [(tree-contains? [[k & children]]
                          (or (= v k) (some tree-contains? children)))
          (single-reparent [[k & children :as tree]]
                           (if (= v k)
                             tree
                             (let [grouped-children (group-by tree-contains? children)
                                   [chosen-one] (grouped-children true)
                                   others (grouped-children nil)
                                   trimmed-tree (concat [k] others)]
                               (concat chosen-one [trimmed-tree]))))]
    (let [next-tree (single-reparent tree)]
      (if (= tree next-tree)
        tree
        (recur v next-tree)))))

(let [p #(and ((set (flatten %)) %2)
                    %)

      g (fn f [s [r & c :as t] a] 
            (if (= r s)
              (if a
                `(~@t ~a)
                t)
  	 	  (let [v remove
                [[x] y] ((juxt filter v) #(p % s) c)]
            (f s x (into '() (v nil? `[~a ~@(reverse y) ~r]))))))]

#(g % %2 nil))

(fn g [n tree]
           (letfn [(parent [n l]
                     (cond (some #{n} l) l
                           (some coll? l) (some (partial parent n) (map (partial parent n) (filter coll? l)))
                           :else nil))

                   (remove-n [n l]
                     (loop [l l
                            acc '()]
                       (if (empty? l)
                         acc
                         (recur (rest l)
                                (cond (= (first l) n) acc
                                      (coll? (first l)) (concat acc [(remove-n n (first l))])
                                      :else (concat acc [(first l)]))))))]
             
             (let [pnode (parent n tree)]
               (cond (= `(~n) tree) tree
                     (= tree n) n
                     (= tree pnode) (concat n [(remove-n n tree)])
                     :else (concat pnode [(g (remove-n pnode (parent pnode tree))
                                             (remove-n pnode tree))])))))

(letfn [(updatek [k] (update-in (apply vector k) [(- (count k) 1)] inc))
      
          (tomap [cll k re]
            (loop [[f & xs] cll k k re re]
            (cond
                (not f) re
                (coll? f) (let [ k2 (updatek k)
                                 re2  (assoc re k2 f)]
                                (recur xs k2 (tomap f (conj k2 0) re2)))
                :else   (recur xs (updatek k) (assoc re (updatek k) f))
             )))
             
             (getchildren [mymap mykey]
               (if (empty? mykey) '()
                 (loop [startkey (concat (butlast mykey) '(1)) re '()]
                    (let [v (mymap startkey)]
                      (cond
                         (= startkey mykey) (recur (updatek startkey) re) 
                         v (recur (updatek startkey) (concat re (list v)))
                         :else (list (concat re (getchildren mymap (butlast mykey))))))))) 
                   
             ]
    (fn [mykey cll]
       (let [mymap (tomap cll [0] {})
             [oldkey] (first (filter (fn [[k v]] (= v mykey)) mymap))
             isRoot (= 1 (count oldkey))
             newroot (if isRoot cll (mymap (butlast oldkey)))]
           (if isRoot newroot
               (concat newroot (getchildren mymap (butlast oldkey)))))))

(letfn [(branches [tree] (->> tree (tree-seq coll? rest) (filter next)))
        (edges [branches]
          (for [[parent :as b] branches
                [child]        (rest b)]
            [parent child]))
        (add-edge    [graph u v] (update-in graph [u] (fnil #(conj % v) [])))
        (remove-edge [graph u v] (update-in graph [u] #(remove (partial = v) %)))
        (build-graph [edges]
          (reduce (fn [graph [u v]] (-> graph (add-edge u v) (add-edge v u)))
                  {}
                  edges))
        (fix-order [graph]
          (into {} (for [[k v] graph]
                     [k (concat (rest v) [(first v)])])))
        (build-tree [root graph]
          (let [graph' (dissoc graph root)]
            (into [root]
                  (for [child (graph root)]
                    (build-tree child
                                (remove-edge graph' child root))))))]
  (fn tree-reparent [new-root tree]
    (->> tree
         branches
         edges
         build-graph
         fix-order
         (build-tree new-root))))

(fn reparent-tree [node-name tree]
  (letfn [(remove-node
            ;; Removes node-name branch from tree.
            [tree node-name]
            (when (not= (first tree) node-name)
              (keep (fn [node]
                      (if (sequential? node)
                        (remove-node node node-name)
                        node))
                    tree)))
          
          (subtree
            ;;Returns subtree of tree which root node is node-name.
            [tree node-name]
            (if (= (first tree) node-name)
              tree
              (loop [leafs (rest tree)]
                (when-let [leaf (first leafs)]
                  (if-let [st (and (sequential? leaf)
                                   (subtree leaf node-name))]
                    st
                    (recur (rest leafs)))))))

          (make-parents-map
            ;;Creates map in which keys are nodes and values are their parents.
            ([tree]
             (make-parents-map tree nil))
            ([tree top-parent]
             (let [parent     (first tree)
                   result-map {parent top-parent}]
               (reduce (fn [result-map child]
                         (if (sequential? child)
                           (merge result-map (make-parents-map child parent))
                           (assoc result-map child parent)))
                       result-map
                       (rest tree)))))

          (make-node-path
            ;;Returns path from node-name to root in given tree.
            [tree node-name]
            (let [par-map (make-parents-map tree)]
              (when (contains? par-map node-name)
                (loop [np        [node-name]
                       node-name node-name]
                  (if-let [parent (get par-map node-name)]
                    (recur (conj np parent) parent)
                    np)))))
          
          (reparent-by-path
            ;; Appends second node in path to first node in path. The second node 
            ;; is created by appending third to second, etc.
            [tree node-path]
            (if-let [node-name (first node-path)]
              (let [node-subtree (subtree tree node-name)]
                (if-let [parent-subtree (reparent-by-path (remove-node tree node-name)
                                                          (rest node-path))]
                  (concat node-subtree (list parent-subtree))
                  node-subtree))
              nil))]
  
    (reparent-by-path tree
                      (make-node-path tree node-name))))

						(if (or (not (seq? tree)) (nil? tree))

(fn re-tree [s xs]
  ((fn tt [xs passed]
     (cond (= (first xs) s) (concat xs passed)
           (empty? xs) nil
           ;; into the leaves
           (coll? (first xs))
           (or (tt (first xs)
                   (list
                    (if (or (coll? (first passed))
                            (> (count passed) 1))
                      (concat
                       (butlast passed)
                       (rest xs)
                       (list (last passed))
                       )
                      (concat passed (rest xs)))
                    ))
               (tt (rest xs) (if (or (coll? (first passed))
                                     (> (count passed) 1))
                               (concat
                                (butlast passed)
                                (list (first xs))
                                (list (last passed)))
                               (concat passed (list (first xs))))

                   )
               )
           :else (tt (rest xs) (cons (first xs) passed)))
     ) xs '())
  )

(fn rotate
  ([sym root] (if (= root (list sym)) root (rotate sym root '())))
  ([sym root carried]
   (let [node-eq? (fn [sym nd] (if (seq? nd) (= sym (first nd)) false))]
     (cond (some #(node-eq? sym %) root) (let [found (first (keep #(if (node-eq? sym %) %) root))
                                               other (remove #(node-eq? sym %) root)]
                                           (concat found (list (concat other (seq carried)))))
           (empty? (next root)) nil
           :else (some (fn [c] (rotate sym c (conj carried (remove #(node-eq? (first c) %) root)))) (next root))))))

(fn [x t]
  (let [[r & nodes :as ts] (tree-seq rest rest t)
        nx (vec (some #(when (= x (first %)) %) nodes))
        old-p (some (fn [n] (when (some #(= x (first %)) (rest n)) n)) ts)
        new-p (remove #(= nx %) old-p)]
    (cond (= x (first r)) t
          (= (first old-p) (first r)) (conj nx new-p)
          :else (conj nx (conj (vec new-p) (remove #(= old-p %) r))))))

(fn [nr t]
  (let [mvt (fn mvt [t] (mapv #(if (coll? %) (mvt %) %) t))
        vt (mvt t)
        sl (fn sl [c l vt] (let [mcl (group-by #(coll? (second %))  (map-indexed vector vt))
                                 mc (first (filter #(= l (second %)) (mcl false)))]
                             (if mc (conj c (first mc))
                               (mapcat #(sl (conj c (first %)) l (second %)) (mcl true)))))
        ntc (sl [] nr vt)                           
        di (fn [col idx] (vec (filter identity (map-indexed #(if (not= %1 idx) %2) col))))
        gnb (fn [c] (let [blc (butlast c) cu (last blc)] (di (get-in vt (butlast blc)) cu)))
        bnt (fn bt [loc] (let [k (gnb loc)] (if (<= (count loc) 2) k (conj k (vec (bt (butlast loc)))))))
        nt (if (= 1 (count ntc)) t (conj (get-in vt (butlast ntc)) (bnt ntc)))
        ]
    nt
    ))

(fn goo 
  ([goal tree] (goo goal tree []))
  ([goal [node & children :as current] parent]
  (let 
    [each-and-others  (fn [xs]
                        (let [xs (vec xs)]
                          (map-indexed (fn [i it]
                                         [ it (concat (subvec xs 0 i ) (subvec xs (inc i)))])
                                       xs)))]
    (if (= goal node) 
      (concat current parent)
      (mapcat (fn [[child siblings]]
                (let 
                  [new-parent (concat (cons node siblings) parent)]
                  (goo goal child (list new-parent))))
              (each-and-others children))))))

(fn [n [f & r :as c]]
  (if (= n f)
    c
    (let [branch   (vec (first (filter #(some #{n} (flatten %)) r)))
          siblings (remove #{branch} r)]
      (recur n (conj branch (cons f siblings))))))

(fn rebalance [new-root tree]
   (letfn [(has-node? [[n l r :as t]]
             (if t (or (= n new-root) (has-node? l) (has-node? r))))
           (rotate [t]
             (let [pivot (first (filter has-node? (rest t)))]
               (if pivot (rotate (concat pivot (vector (remove (partial = pivot) t)))) t)))]
     (rotate tree)))

(fn reparent 
  ([node tree]
    (reparent node tree identity))
  ([node tree rev]
    (if (= (first tree) node)
      (rev tree)
      (some #(reparent node % 
                       (fn [n]
                         (concat n [(remove #{n} (rev tree))]))) 
            (rest tree)))))

(fn reparent [node tree]
  (cond
   (or (< (count tree) 2) (= node (first tree))) tree
   (= node (first (second tree))) (conj (vec (second tree)) (cons (first tree) (rest (rest tree))))
   (= node (first (first (rest (rest tree))))) (cons node (list (concat (take 2 tree) (drop 3 tree))))
   :else (let [new-child (reparent node (first (rest tree)))
               insert (fn [tree branch parent]
                        (cond
                         (= parent (first (second tree))) (cons (first tree) (list (conj (vec (second tree)) branch)))
                         (= parent (first (last tree))) (concat (butlast tree) (list (concat (last tree) (list branch))))))]
           (insert new-child (cons (first tree) (rest (rest tree))) (first (second tree))))))

(fn [r t]
  (let [o (into {} ((fn e [[n & c]]
                        (cons [n (map first c)]
                              (mapcat e c))) t))
        i (into {} (for [[a bs] o b bs] [b [a]]))]
    ((fn d [n s]
       (let [c (remove s (concat (o n) (i n)))
             s (into s c)]
         (cons n (map #(d % s) c))))
     r #{r})))

(fn reparent [target tree]
  (if (= target (first tree))
    tree
    (let [remove-target (fn [[fst & rst]] (list* fst (remove #(-> % meta :target) rst)))
          tree' (clojure.walk/postwalk (fn [x]
                                         (if (list? x)
                                           (if-let [targeted (first (filter #(:target (meta %)) x))]
                                             (let [target-meta (meta targeted)
                                                   {:keys [child parent purged?]} (:target target-meta)]
                                               (cond
                                                 purged? (with-meta x target-meta)
                                                 (and child parent) (with-meta (remove-target x) (assoc-in target-meta [:target :purged?] true))
                                                 child (with-meta x (assoc-in target-meta [:target :parent] (remove-target x)))
                                                 :else (throw (ex-info "blurgh" {:target-meta target-meta}))))
                                             (if (= target (first x))
                                               (with-meta x {:target {:child x}})
                                               x))
                                           x))
                                       tree)
            targeted (:target (meta tree'))
            {:keys [child parent purged?]} targeted
            parent (if purged?
                     (list* (first parent) `(~@(rest parent) (~@tree')))
                     parent)]
      (list* (first child) `(~@(rest child) (~@parent))))))

(fn reparent [nr tree]
  (let [children (into {} (map (fn [x] (vector (first x) (map first (rest x)))) (tree-seq seq? rest tree)))
        parent (into {} (apply concat (map (fn [[parent children]] (map #(vector % parent) children) ) children )))
        descend (fn descend [start seen]
                  (let [nodes (filter #(and (identity %) ((complement seen) % )) (concat (children start) [(parent start)]))]
                    (if (empty? nodes)
                      (list start)
                  (concat (list start) (map #(descend % (into seen nodes)) nodes)))))]
    (descend nr #{nr})))

(fn [r t]
  (let [->p (fn ->p [t]
              (let [[p & c] t]
                (apply merge
                       (->> (map first c)
                            (map #(vector % p))
                            (into {}))
                       (map ->p c))))
        p (->p t)
        ->t (fn ->t [g r]
              (cons r
                    (->> (filter #(% r) g)
                         (map #(disj % r))
                         (map first)
                         sort
                         (sort-by #(= % (p r)))
                         (map (partial ->t (remove #(% r) g))))))
        ->g (fn ->g [t]
              (when (< 1 (count t))
                (apply clojure.set/union
                       (->> (rest t)
                            (map first)
                            (map (partial hash-set (first t)))
                            set)
                       (->> (rest t)
                            (map ->g)))))]
    (->t (->g t) r)))

(fn [new-root tree]
    (letfn [(append-child [tree node partial-tree]
               (if (= (first tree) node)
                   (concat tree (list partial-tree))
                   (cons (first tree) (map (fn [subtree] (if (has-node? node subtree) (append-child subtree node partial-tree) subtree)) (rest tree)))))
            (has-node? [node tree]
               (or (= (first tree) node)
                   (some (partial has-node? node) (rest tree))))
            (rotate-tree [new-root tree]
               (cond
                (= (first tree) new-root) tree
                :else
                 (let [rotate-idx (some (fn [idx] (if (has-node? new-root (nth tree idx)) idx nil)) (range 1 (count tree)))
                       child-tree (nth tree rotate-idx)
                       partial-tree (map (fn [idx] (nth tree idx)) (concat (range 0 rotate-idx) (range (inc rotate-idx) (count tree))))]
                       (append-child (rotate-tree new-root child-tree) (first child-tree) partial-tree))))]
       (rotate-tree new-root tree)))

(fn prob-0130
  [new-root-sym tree]

  (letfn [(iter-tree-paths
            [pre node]
            (lazy-seq
              (if (empty? node)
                []
                (let [node-sym    (first node)
                      node-childs (rest  node)
                      node-path   (conj pre node-sym)]
                  (cons
                   node-path
                   (mapcat #(iter-tree-paths node-path %) node-childs))))))

          (path-in-tree
            [root sym]
            (first (drop-while #(not= sym (last %)) (iter-tree-paths [] root))))

          (find-child
            [tree-node child-sym]
            (first (drop-while #(not= child-sym (first %)) (rest tree-node))))

          (reroot-tree
            [old-root reroots]
            (if (empty? reroots)
              old-root
              (let [cur-root-sym (first old-root)
                    new-root-sym (first reroots)]
                (if (= cur-root-sym new-root-sym)
                  (recur old-root (rest reroots))
                  (let [new-root (find-child old-root new-root-sym)
                        old-filt (filter #(not= new-root %) old-root)]
                    (recur (lazy-cat new-root [old-filt]) (rest reroots)))))))
          ]

    (reroot-tree tree (path-in-tree tree new-root-sym))))

(fn [node tree]
  (letfn [(pathes [t p]
            (cond
              (empty? t) nil
              (= node (first t)) (conj p t)
              :else (some #(pathes % (conj p t)) (rest t))))
          (reparent [p n]
            (concat n [(remove #(= % n) p)]))]
    (reduce reparent (pathes tree []))))

(fn [root tree]
  (letfn [(findroot [fragment tree]
    (cond 
     (= root (first tree)) tree
     (empty? (rest fragment)) nil
     :else (some (fn [child]
                  (findroot child (concat child (list (remove #(= child %) tree)))))
                (rest fragment))))]
    (findroot tree tree)))

    (let [[f r]
          ((juxt filter remove) #(some #{parent} (flatten %)) t)]

(fn tp [n tree]
  (let [get-parents (fn f [[x & kids]]
                      (concat (map #(vector (first %) x) kids)
                               (mapcat f kids)))
        parent-of (into {} (get-parents tree))
        path-up-from (fn f [n] (let [parent (parent-of n)]
                                 (if parent (cons (parent-of n) (f (parent-of n))))))
        path-to-n (reverse (path-up-from n))
        upshift-targets (concat (rest path-to-n) (list n))
        upshift (fn [new-root [old-root & kids]]
                  (let [branch-to-shift (first (filter #(= new-root (first %)) kids))
                        other-branches (remove #(= new-root (first %)) kids)]
                    (if (nil? branch-to-shift) (cons old-root kids)
                      (concat branch-to-shift (list (cons old-root other-branches))))))
        ]
    (loop [targets upshift-targets
           current-tree tree]
      (if (empty? targets) current-tree
        (recur (rest targets) (upshift (first targets) current-tree))))))

(fn full-reparent [node tree]
  (letfn [(vectorize [tree]
            (if (= (count tree) 1)
              (vec tree)
              (into [(first tree)] (map vectorize (rest tree)))))
          (search [node tree]
            (letfn [(s [node tree & [path]]
                      (cond (= (first tree) node) (conj (vec path) 0)
                            (= (count tree) 1) nil
                            true (for [x (range 1 (count tree))]
                                   (s node (tree x) (conj (vec path) x)))))]
              (->> (s node tree)
                   flatten
                   (filter identity)
                   vec)))
          (reparent [tree indexes]
            (if (= (count indexes) 1) tree
                (reparent
                 (into (tree (first indexes))
                       [(vec (filter identity (assoc-in tree [(first indexes)] nil)))])
                 (rest indexes))))]
    (let [tree (vectorize tree)
          path (search node tree)]
      (reparent tree (search node tree)))))

(fn [t table]
  (let [down (fn ff [x]  (if (empty?(rest x)) 
                           {(first x) nil} 
                           (merge {(first x) (set (map first (rest x)))} (apply merge (map ff (rest x))))))
        up (fn ff [x]  (if (empty?(rest x)) 
                         {} 
                         (merge (zipmap (map first (rest x)) (repeat (first x))) (apply merge (map ff (rest x))))))
	    dictdown (down table)
        dictup (up table)
        f (fn ff [done doing] 
            (let [ud (conj (vec (sort (get dictdown doing))) (get dictup doing)) 
                  r (filter #(not (or (nil? %) (done %))) ud)] 
              (if (empty? r) (list doing) (cons doing (map #(ff (conj done doing) %) r)))))]  
    (f #{nil} t)))

(fn [root tree]
  (let [graph (apply merge-with into (reverse (map (fn [n] (into {(first n) (vec (map first (rest n)))}
                                                        (map (fn [c] {(first c) [(first n)]})
                                                             (rest n))))
                                          (tree-seq seq? rest tree))))]
    ((fn reparent [seen root]
       (cons root
             (map #(reparent (conj seen root) %) 
                  (filter #(not (seen %)) 
                          (graph root)))))
     #{} root)))

(fn tree-reparent
  ([pull t] (tree-reparent pull pull t))
  ([pull push [h & cs :as t]]
   (letfn [(next-push [[h & cs] push]
             (if (= h push)
               (first (last cs))
               (some identity (map #(next-push % push) cs))))
           (add-child [[h & cs :as recipient] child target]
             (if (= h target)
               (concat recipient [child])
               (cons h (map #(add-child % child target) cs))))
           (rotate [pull push [h & cs :as t]]
             (let [pull-t (first (filter #(= pull (first %)) cs))]
               (if pull-t
                 (let [t' (filter #(not= % pull-t) t)
                       pull-t' (add-child pull-t t' push)]
                   pull-t')
                 (cons h (map (partial rotate pull push) cs)))))]
     (if (= h pull)
       t
       (let [t (rotate pull push t)
             push (next-push t push)]
         (tree-reparent pull push t))))))

(fn [lift-el T]
    (let [kids (fn [[_ & ks]] ks)
          tree (fn [eln kids] (list* eln kids))
          add (fn [el T] (concat T [el]))
          name-fn (fn [[eln & _]] eln)
          find-kid (fn [[_ & ks] el-name]
                     (first (filter #(= el-name (name-fn %)) ks)))
          remove-kid (fn [[eln & ks] el-name]
                       (tree eln
                             (remove #(= el-name (name-fn %)) ks)))
          lift-kid (fn [T el-name]
                     (add (remove-kid T el-name)
                          (find-kid T el-name)))
          path-fn (fn p [so-far goal [eln & kids]]
                    (if (= eln goal)
                      (conj so-far eln)
                      (mapcat (partial p (conj so-far eln) goal) kids)))
          path (rest (path-fn [] lift-el T))]
      (reduce lift-kid T path)))

(fn f130
  [x t]
  (letfn [(f130-contains
            [t x]
            (if (= x (first t))
              true
              (some #(f130-contains % x) (rest t))))
          (drop-nth [n coll]
            (concat
             (take n coll)
             (drop (inc n) coll)))]
    (let [ci (first (remove nil? (for [i (range 1 (count t))]
                                (when (f130-contains (nth t i) x)
                                  i))))]
      (cond
        ;; already root
        (= x (first t)) t

        ;; x is in child
        ci    (let [new-r           (drop-nth ci t)
                    promoted-branch (concat (nth t ci) [new-r])
                    new-tree        (cons (first promoted-branch) (map #(f130 x %) (rest promoted-branch)))]
                (if (= x (first new-tree))
                  new-tree
                  (f130 x new-tree)
                  ))
        :else t))))

              (if (= (first tree) (first (first result)))
                result
                (let [next-node (first (filter #((set %) current-node) all-nodes))

            (create-new-tree [node-list]

(letfn [(find-first [f coll]
                    (first (drop-while (complement f) coll)))
        (append [l el]
                (if (nil? el)
                    l
                    (concat l (list el))))
        (step [n t]
              (if-let [[h & cs] t]
                (if (= h n)
                    [t nil]
                    (let [r (for [c cs] [c (step n c)])
                          [c [h o :as f]] (find-first (comp (complement nil?) first second) r)]
                      (if-not f
                        [nil t]
                        [h (conj o (remove #{c} t))])))
                [nil t]))]
  (fn [n t]
    (let [[r c] (step n t)]
      (reduce #(append %2 %1) (append c r)))))

(fn [the-node-name root]
  (letfn [
           (hoist
             ; Given a parent node and one of its child nodes, return a node
             ; that is the same as the child node, except it has an additional
             ; child as its last. The new child is the same as the former
             ; parent node, except it no longer has the given child node as a
             ; child.
             [[tree-name & children] [name & _ :as node]]

             (let [demoted-tree (cons
                                  tree-name
                                  (remove #(= name (first %)) children))
                   ]
               (concat node [demoted-tree])))

           (path
             ; Generate the path from this-node to the node named
             ; the-node-name. Return it appended to the given path so far.
             [so-far [name & children :as this-node]]

             (let [path-here (conj so-far this-node)]
               (if (= the-node-name name)
                 path-here        ; Found it!
                 ; Else, examine the children of this-node.
                 (some (partial path path-here) children))))
           ]
    (reduce hoist (path [] root))))

(fn [target-node tree]
  (loop [current-node tree, parent-node nil, left-nodes (), right-nodes (), reached-end? false]
    (cond
      (= target-node (first current-node))
        (let [reconstruct (fn reconstruct [parent-node left-nodes right-nodes]
                            (if (nil? parent-node)
                              ()
                              (list 
                                (concat (:node parent-node)
                                        left-nodes 
                                        right-nodes 
                                        (reconstruct (:parent parent-node) (:left parent-node) (:right parent-node))))))]
          (concat current-node (reconstruct parent-node left-nodes right-nodes)))
      (and reached-end? (empty? (:right parent-node)))
        (recur (concat (:node parent-node) left-nodes current-node right-nodes)
               (:parent parent-node)
               (:left parent-node)
               (:right parent-node)
               true)
      reached-end?
        (recur (first (:right parent-node))
               (:parent parent-node)
               (concat (:left parent-node) (list (concat (:node parent-node) left-nodes current-node right-nodes)))
               (rest (:right parent-node))
               false)
      (not-empty (rest current-node))
        (recur (second current-node)
               {:node (list (first current-node)), :parent parent-node, :left left-nodes, :right right-nodes}
               ()
               (nnext current-node)
               false)
      (not-empty right-nodes)
        (recur (first right-nodes)
               parent-node
               (concat left-nodes (list current-node))
               (rest right-nodes)
               false)
      :otherwise
        (recur current-node
               parent-node
               left-nodes
               right-nodes
               true))))

        (edge-map [tree]

                         (let [match-root (fn [x]  (= n (when (sequential? x) (first x))))
                               sub-tree (filter match-root t)
                               rem-tree (remove #(= (first sub-tree ) %) t)
                               new-tree (concat (first sub-tree) (list rem-tree))]
                           new-tree))
        adjlist (fn [t]
                  (into {} (mapcat  (fn [x]
                                      (map #(hash-map %1 (first x))
                                           (map first (rest x))))
                                    (filter seq? (tree-seq seq? identity t))) ))
        fliproot (fn fliproot [m r]
                   (loop [path [r] r' r]
                     (cond
                      (m r') (recur (cons (m r') path) (m r') )
                      true path))
                   )
        path (fliproot (adjlist t) n)]
    (reduce fold-root-into
            t (rest path)))
  )

(fn reparent [target tree]
  (let [
    root               (fn[T] (first  T))
    nth-node           (fn[T n] (nth T n))
    remove-nth-node    (fn[T n]      (concat (take n T) (drop (inc n) T)))
    insert-nth-node    (fn[T n node] (concat T (list node)))

    in-here?         (fn[e node] ((set (flatten node)) e))

    find-child         (fn[T]
                         (loop [[cnode & rnodes] (rest T), n 1]
                           (cond
                             (nil? cnode) n
                             (in-here? target cnode) n
                             :else
                               (recur rnodes (inc n)))))  
    
    reparent-at       (fn[T n] (insert-nth-node (nth-node T n) n
                                                (remove-nth-node T n)))
                                           	
                                           	
    start-reparent
      (fn keep-reparenting [T]                                       	
        (if (= (root T) target)
         	T
         (let [nchild (find-child T)]
             (keep-reparenting (reparent-at T nchild)))))]
             
    (start-reparent tree)))

                  (let [branch-to-shift (first (filter #(= new-root (first %)) kids))
                        other-branches (remove #(= new-root (first %)) kids)]
                    (if (nil? branch-to-shift) (cons old-root kids) 
                      (concat branch-to-shift (list (cons old-root other-branches))))))
        ]
    (loop [targets upshift-targets

(fn [node t]
    (letfn [(rephrase [node]
              (when (coll? node)
                (let [parent (first node)
                      children (rest node)
                      rels (vec (for [child children] [parent (first child)]))]
                  (into rels
                        (mapcat rephrase children)))))]
      (if (= node (first t)) t
          (let [relations (rephrase t)
                parent->children (->> (map (fn [[p c]] {p [c]}) relations)
                                      (apply merge-with concat))
                child->parent (->> (map (fn [[p c]] [c p]) relations)
                                   (into {}))]
            (letfn [(down [node]
                      (let [children (parent->children node)]
                        (if-not children (list node)
                                (cons node (map down children)))))
                    (not-me [parent node]
                      (filter #(if-not (coll? %) true
                                       (not= (first %) node)) parent))
                    (up [node]
                      (let [parent (child->parent node)]
                        (when parent
                          (let [parent-tree (up parent)]
                            (concat (not-me (down parent) node)
                                    (when parent-tree (list parent-tree)))))))]
              (let [my-children (down node)
                    my-parent (up node)]
                (cons node (concat (rest my-children) (list my-parent))))
              ))))
    )

(fn reparent [new-root tree]
   (letfn [
         (tree-to-map [tree]
           (letfn [(t-to-m [tree m]
                     (if (empty? tree) m
                       (reduce #(t-to-m %2 %1)
                                (assoc m (first tree) (vec (map first (rest tree))))
                                (rest tree))))]
             (t-to-m tree {:root [(first tree)]})))
         (map-to-tree [m]
           (letfn [(m-to-t [m n]
                     (loop [[x & xs :as children] (get m n), result [n]]
                       (if (empty? children) result
                           (recur xs (conj result (m-to-t m x))))))]
             (m-to-t m (first (get m :root)))))
         (get-parent [n m] (some #(if (some #{n} (second %)) (first %) nil) m))
         (remove-child [p c m] (update-in m [p] #(vec (remove (partial = c) (or % [])))))
         (add-child [p c m] (update-in m [p] #(conj (or % []) c)))
         (reorder-children [n m]
           (let [p (get-parent n m)]
             (if (= :root p) m
                 (add-child n p (reorder-children p (remove-child p n m))))))]

      (map-to-tree (assoc (reorder-children new-root (tree-to-map tree)) :root [new-root]))))

(cond
(and true (= arg2 (quote (n)))) (quote (n))
(and true (= arg2 (quote (t (e) (a))))) (quote (a (t (e))))
(and true (= arg2 (quote (a (t (e)))))) (quote (e (t (a))))
(and true (= arg2 (quote (c (b (a)))))) (quote (a (b (c))))
(and true (= arg2 (quote (a (b (c) (d) (e)) (f (g) (h)))))) (quote (d (b (c) (e) (a (f (g) (h))))))
(and true (= arg2 (quote (a (b (c (d) (e)) (f (g) (h))) (i (j (k) (l)) (m (n) (o))))))) (quote (c (d) (e) (b (f (g) (h)) (a (i (j (k) (l)) (m (n) (o)))))))
))

(fn tree_reparent [target tree]
    (let
        [
            ; given a tree represented by a sequence as well as a subtree position defined by a sequence
            ; of indices that represent the path from the root to the subtree, return the tree without
            ; the described subtree
            ; note that we assume the structure of the tree as (head & children)
            delete_subtree_by_indices
                (fn f [[head & children] [index & others]]
                    (if (= index others nil)
                        '() ; handle edge case in which the entire tree is destined to be deleted
                        (loop [ret [head] c 0 curr_children children]
                            (let
                                [
                                    curr (first curr_children)
                                ]
                                (cond
                                    (empty? curr_children) ret
                                    (= c index)
                                        (if (= others nil)
                                            (recur ret (inc c) (rest curr_children))
                                            (recur (conj ret (f curr others)) (inc c) (rest curr_children))
                                        )
                                    :otherwise (recur (conj ret curr) (inc c) (rest curr_children))
                                )
                            )
                        )
                    )
                )
                        
            ; given a tree represented by a sequence, as well as a subtree position defined by a sequence
            ; of indices that represent the path from the root to the subtree, and a sequence that represents
            ; a subtree to be appended at the desired position, return the tree with the given subtree appended
            ; note that we assume the structure of the tree as (head & children)
            append_subtree_by_indices
                (fn f [[head & children :as all] [index & others] new_subtree]
                    (cond
                        (or (= head nil) (empty? all)) new_subtree ;edge case in which we simply return the new subtree
                        (= nil index) (conj (vec all) new_subtree)
                        :otherwise
                            (loop [ret [head] c 0 curr_children children]
                                (let
                                    [
                                        curr (first curr_children)
                                    ]
                                    (cond
                                        (empty? curr_children) ret
                                        (= c index) (recur (conj ret (f curr others new_subtree)) (inc c) (rest curr_children))
                                        :otherwise (recur (conj ret curr) (inc c) (rest curr_children))
                                    )
                                )
                            )
                    )
                )
            
            ; retrieve a subtree given a path of indices to locate the subtree within a given tree
            retrieve_subtree_by_indices
                (fn f [[head & children :as subtree] [index & others :as indices]]
                    (loop [[head & children :as subtree] subtree [index & others] indices]
                        (if (or (= subtree nil) (= index nil))
                            subtree
                            (recur (nth children index nil) others)
                        )
                    )
                )

            ; if the target is present in the tree, return a sequence of indices denoting a path
            ; towards the target node
            retrieve_target_path
                (fn f [[head & children :as root] target]
                    (cond
                        (and (sequential? root) (= head target)) '()
                        (sequential? root)
                            (let
                                [
                                    x (some (fn [[a b]] (if (not= a nil) [a b])) (map list (map #(f % target) children) (range))) ;Andrew Allhusen assisted
                                ]
                                (if (= x nil)
                                    nil
                                    (let [[a b] x] (cons b a))
                                )
                            )
                        :otherwise (if (= head target) '())
                    )
                )

            path_to_subtree (retrieve_target_path tree target)
            alpha1 (retrieve_subtree_by_indices tree path_to_subtree)
            alpha2
                (if (or (= (first path_to_subtree) nil) (= (first path_to_subtree) nil))
                    '()
                    (delete_subtree_by_indices (nth (rest tree) (first path_to_subtree) nil) (rest path_to_subtree))
                )
            alpha3
                (if (= (first path_to_subtree) nil)
                    tree
                    (delete_subtree_by_indices tree [(first path_to_subtree)])
                )
            combine1
                (if (= (first path_to_subtree) nil)
                    alpha3
                    (append_subtree_by_indices alpha2 (rest (drop-last path_to_subtree)) alpha3)
                )
            combine2
                (if (= (first path_to_subtree) nil)
                    tree
                    (append_subtree_by_indices alpha1 [] combine1)
                )
        ]
        combine2

    )
)

(fn [x h]
  (letfn [(fnd [x [d1 & ds :as dd] p] (if (= x d1) (cons dd p) (some #(fnd x % (cons dd p)) ds)))
         (drp [x [d1 & ds :as dd]] (if (and x dd (not= x dd)) (cons d1 (reduce #(if (= x %2) %1 (conj %1 (drp x %2))) [] ds))))]
    (let [[t p] (fnd x h nil) p-t (drp t p) h-p (drp p h) r2 (if h-p (conj (vec p-t) h-p) p-t)]
      (if r2 (conj (vec t) r2) t))))

(fn __ [new tree]
  (letfn [(r [p t]
            (if (= (first t) new)
              (if (empty? p) t (conj (vec t) p))
              (loop [a (rest t)]
                (if (some #(= % new) (flatten (first a)))
                  (r (conj (vec (remove #(= (first a) %) t)) p) (first a))
                  (recur (rest a))))))]
    (if (<= (count tree) 1) tree
      (r (remove (fn [a] (some #(= % new) (flatten a))) tree)
         (first (filter (fn [a] (some #(= % new) (flatten a))) tree))))))

(fn [new-root tree]
    ;; Find target subtree
    ;; Find parent
    ;; Append parent, minus target subtree, to end of target subtree
    ;; Wash, rinse, repeat
    (letfn [(subtree-map [tree]
              (let [ts (tree-seq coll? next tree)]
                (zipmap (map first ts) ts)))
            (parent-tree [node subtrees]
              (first
               (for [k (keys subtrees)
                     :let [subtree (get subtrees k)]
                     :when (some #{node} (map first (next subtree)))]
                 subtree)))
            (make-node-new-root [node subtrees child-subtree i]
              (let [root-subtree (get subtrees node)
                    parent (parent-tree node subtrees)
                    parent-without-root-subtree (remove #(= root-subtree %) parent)]
                (if (empty? parent)
                  child-subtree
                  (concat
                   (list (first root-subtree))
                   (remove #(= new-root (first %)) (next root-subtree))
                   (list (make-node-new-root (first parent) subtrees parent-without-root-subtree (inc i)))))))]
      (let [subtrees (subtree-map tree)]
        (make-node-new-root new-root subtrees (get subtrees new-root) 0))))

(fn [new-root tree]
   (letfn [(take-until [pred coll]
             (let [[t d] (split-with (complement pred) coll)]
               (if (empty? d) t (lazy-cat t (take 1 d)))))
           (find-new-root [new-root tree]
             (reverse
              (take-until
               #(= new-root (first %))
               (tree-seq coll? rest tree))))
           (replace-to-root [[f & r]]
             (second
              (reduce
               (fn [[sets rep :as red] parent]
                 (if-let [matched (some sets parent)]
                   (let [removed (filter #(not= matched %) parent)]
                     [#{(vec parent)} (conj rep (reverse removed))])
                   red))
               [#{(vec f)} (list (reverse f))]
               r)))
           (build-rotated-tree [[fnode & rnodes]]
             (reduce
              (fn [c p] (reverse (conj p c)))
              (reverse fnode)
              rnodes))]
     (->> (find-new-root new-root tree)
         (replace-to-root)
          (build-rotated-tree)
          )))

(fn [target tree]
  (let [vt (clojure.walk/postwalk #(if (seq? %) (vec %) %) tree)
        rm-at (fn [v n] (into (subvec v 0 n) (subvec v (inc n))))]
    (if (< (count tree) 2)
      tree
      (loop [statestack [{:cv vt :idx 1 :nvt []}]]
        (let [state (peek statestack) cv (:cv state) idx (:idx state) nvt (:nvt state)]
          (if (>= idx (count cv))
            (let [prevstate (peek (pop statestack)) nextidx (inc (:idx prevstate))]
              (recur (conj (pop statestack) (merge prevstate {:idx nextidx}))))
            (if (= target (first (cv idx)))
              (conj (cv idx) (if (empty? nvt) (rm-at cv idx) (conj (rm-at cv idx) nvt)))
              (recur (conj statestack {:cv (cv idx) :idx 1 :nvt (if (empty? nvt) (rm-at cv idx) (conj (rm-at cv idx) nvt))})))))))))

(fn p[root tree]
  (let [parent  (fn parent [r t]
                     (if (> (count t) 1)
                       (let [st (filter #(some #{r} %) (next t))]
                         (if (seq st)
                           [(first t)]
                           (apply concat (map #(parent r %) (next t)))))))
        children (fn children [r t]
                   (if (= r (first t))
                     (map first (next t))
                     (apply concat (map #(children r %) (next t)))))
        st (fn st [r s]
             (let [f (filter #(nil? (s %)) (concat (children r tree) (parent r tree)))]
               (cons r (map #(st % (into s f)) f))))]
    (st root #{root})))

(letfn [
        (expand
          ([tree]
             (expand tree nil))
          ([node parent]
             (let [current (first node)
                   children (rest node)]
               (loop [rm children, acc {current {:parent parent :children (mapv first children)}}]
                 (cond (empty? rm) acc
                       :else (recur (rest rm) (conj acc (expand (first rm) current))))))))

        (get-parent [graph node]
          (if (nil? node)
            (ffirst (filter #(nil? (:parent (val %))) graph))
            (:parent (graph node))))

        (get-children [graph node]
          (:children (graph node)))

        (collapse
          ([graph]
             (collapse graph (get-parent graph nil)))
          ([graph node]
             (loop [rm (get-children graph node), acc [node]]
               (cond (empty? rm) acc
                     :else (recur (rest rm) (conj acc (collapse graph (first rm))))))))

        (mod-node [graph node new-parent]
          (let [old-parent (get-parent graph node)
                children (into [] (remove (partial = new-parent) (get-children graph node)))]
            (assoc graph node {:parent new-parent
                               :children (if old-parent (conj children old-parent) children)})))
        
        (drag-to-root [node graph]
          (loop [curr-node node, new-parent nil, acc graph]
            (let [curr-parent (get-parent graph curr-node)]
              (cond (nil? curr-node) acc
                    :else (recur curr-parent curr-node (mod-node acc curr-node new-parent))))))]
  (fn [node tree]
    (collapse (drag-to-root node (expand tree)))))

(fn [r t]
  ((fn q [[n & s] m]
     (if (= r n) m
         (some seq
               (for [x s]
                 (q x (concat x [(filter #(not= x %) m)]))))))
   t t))

(fn [node tree]
  (let [do-reparent
        (fn do-reparent [tree extend-with]
          (let [this-tmp (if extend-with (conj (vec tree) extend-with) tree)]
          (if (= (first tree) node)
            [true this-tmp]
            (let [converted
                  (for [subtree (rest tree)
                        :let
                        [this-new (remove (partial = subtree) this-tmp)
                         result (do-reparent subtree this-new)]
                        :when (first result)]
                    result)]                    
              (if (empty? converted)
                [false tree]
                (first converted))))))]
    (second (do-reparent tree nil))
    ))

(fn [new-root tree]
  (let [connections ((fn links [tree]
                       (when-let [[root & children] (seq tree)]
                         (let [child-links (apply merge {} (map links children))
                               conj (fnil conj [])]
                           (reduce (fn [m [child]]
                                     (-> m
                                         (update-in [root] conj child)
                                         (update-in [child] conj root)))
                                   child-links
                                   children))))
                     tree)]
    (second
     ((fn dangle [edges root]
        (if-let [children (not-empty (get edges root))]
          (let [edges (reduce (fn [edges from]
                                (update-in edges [from]
                                           #(remove #{root} %)))
                              (dissoc edges root)
                              children)]
            (reduce (fn [[edges tree] child]
                      (let [[new-edges new-tree] (dangle edges child)]
                        [new-edges (conj tree new-tree)]))
                    [edges [root]]
                    children))
          [edges [root]]))
      connections new-root))))

(fn [c t]
  (letfn [(path [[node & childs]]
                (if (= node c) 
                  (list c)
                  (let [sub-path (->> (map path childs) (filter identity) first)]
                    (if-not (nil? sub-path) (cons node sub-path)))))
          (reparent [anchor [node & childs]]
                    (let [[l r] (split-with #(not= anchor (first %)) childs)
                          [sub-node & sub-childs] (first r)]
                      (concat [sub-node] sub-childs [(concat [node] l (rest r))])))]
    (reduce #(reparent %2 %1) t (rest (path t)))))

(fn __ [s tree]
    (let [remove (fn [parent child]
                   (filter #(not (and (seq? %) (= (first %) child))) parent))
           path-to (fn path-to [root node]
                     (cond
                       (empty? root) false
                       (= (first root) node) (list root)
                       :else (if-let [path (some identity (map #(path-to % node)
                                                               (rest root)))]
                               (cons root path)
                               false)))
           path-to-s (path-to tree s)
           promote-child (fn [root child]
                           (concat child [(remove root (first child))]))]
          (reduce promote-child (first path-to-s) (rest path-to-s))))

(fn de-whole-schebang [node tree]

  (letfn [

        ;; Pull the node and its children out,
        ;; Append the recursed parent to its children
                  
        ;; It's a military operation!
        ;; Extract the target! 
          
          (pull-full-node-out [node tree]
            (letfn [(handle-non-current-node [node tree]
            ;; A dark hole of recursion here lol.
                      (let [recursed-children (map #(pull-full-node-out node %) (rest tree))
                            result (filter #(not (false? %)) recursed-children)] 
              ;; Drop the [base].
                        (if (seq result)
                          (first result)
                ;; like your teeth.
                          false))
                      )

                    (check-currentness [node tree]
                      (if (= node (first tree))
                        tree ;; of life 
                        (handle-non-current-node node tree)
                        )
                      )

                    (coll-v-non-coll [node tree]
                      (if (coll? tree)
                        (check-currentness node tree)
                        false
                        )
                      )]

              (coll-v-non-coll node tree))
            )

          ;; He needs medical treatment! We have to hurry! 
                    
          ;; Everything but the node
          ;; 
          ;; Build the children recursively
          ;; Base case is non seq or equal to node 
          ;; D00d. Wut does each recursive call gen. A list? A vecky-poo? 
                    
          ;; Hug the eyeball! 
                    
          ;; This whole things returns a list.
          ;; Base case is when the seq has a count of one.
          (all-but-node [node tree]
          ;; Need to filter falses.
            (if (= node (first tree)) 
              false
              (if (= (count tree) 1)
                tree
                (into [(first tree)] (remove false? (map #(all-but-node node %) (rest tree))))
                )
              )
            )

          ;; *Wipes a tear from my eye* I grow up so fast! 
                    
          ;; Get parent
          ;; Base case count 1 or child has node
          ;; recurse, or
          (get-parent-node [node tree]
            (letfn [(child-has-target-node [node subtree]
                      (some #(= (first %) node) (rest subtree))
                      )

                    (check-child-nodes [node subtree]
                      (filter #(not (false? %)) (map #(get-parent-node node %) (rest tree)))
                      )]

              (if (= (count tree) 1)
                false
          ;; Encapsulating in functions increases readability
                (if (child-has-target-node node tree)
                  (first tree)
                  (first (check-child-nodes node tree))
                  )
                ))
            
            )

          ;; (= 'a (get-parent-node 't '(a (t (e)))))
          ;; (= 'g (get-parent-node 'a '(g (a (b) (c)) (d (e) (f)))))
          ;; (= nil (get-parent-node 'g '(g (a (b) (c)) (d (e) (f)))))
                    
          ]


    (if (= node (first tree))
      tree
      (let [remd-node (pull-full-node-out node tree)
            all-but   (all-but-node node tree)
            parent    (get-parent-node node tree)]
        (if parent 
          (conj (vec remd-node) (de-whole-schebang parent all-but))
          tree)
        )
      ))
)

(fn reparent [root tree]
  (let[parentMap (atom {})
       nodeMap (atom {})
       gen-tree-map (fn gen-tree[tree root]
                      (do
                        (swap! parentMap assoc (first tree) root)
                        (swap! nodeMap assoc (first tree) tree)
                        (loop[subtree (rest tree)]
                          (when (seq subtree)
                            (do 
                              (gen-tree (first subtree) tree)
                              (recur (rest subtree)))))))
       re-org (fn org[n t]
                  (let [node (@nodeMap n)
                        oldParent (@parentMap n)]
                    (concat (list n)
                            (remove #(= t (first %)) (rest node))
                            (when (not(nil? oldParent))
                              (list (org (first oldParent) n))))))]
    (do
      (gen-tree-map tree nil)
      (re-org root root))))

#(let [detach (fn [tree node]
                (let [path (atom [])
                      found (atom [nil []])
                      visit (fn [n t]
                              (if (seq? t)
                                (if (= (first t) n)
                                  (do
                                    (reset! found [t (pop @path)]);)
                                    nil)
                                  (do
                                    (when (seq @path)
                                      (swap! path pop))
                                    (remove nil? t)))
                                (do
                                  (swap! path conj t)
                                  t)))]
                  {:rem (clojure.walk/postwalk (partial visit node) tree)
                   :det (first @found)
                   :path (second @found)
                   }))
       detachments (fn detachments [tree node]
                     (let [{r :rem d :det p :path} (detach tree node)]
                       (when d
                         (cons d (detachments r (peek p))))))
       attach (fn [t2 t1]
                (if (seq t1)
                  (concat t1 (list t2))
                  t2))
       reparent (fn [tree node]
                  (reduce attach (reverse (detachments tree node))))
       ]
   (reparent %2 %1))

(fn [node tree]
  (let [path (fn path [target-node acc [parent & nodes]]
               (cond
                (= target-node parent) (conj acc parent)

        new-tree (fn new-tree
                   [remove-list nodes acc]
                   (let [remove-node (first remove-list)]
                     (if remove-node
                       (new-tree (rest remove-list) 
                                 (first (filter #(= (first %) remove-node) (rest nodes)))
                                 (list (concat (remove #(and (sequential? %)
                                                             (= (first %) remove-node)) 
                                                       nodes)
                                               acc)))
                       (concat nodes acc))))
        remove-node-list (rest (path node [] tree))]
    (new-tree remove-node-list tree '())))

(fn [node tree]
  (letfn [(append-back [l1 l2]
            (concat l1 (list l2)))

          (find-path [node tree]
            (cond
             (empty? tree) '()
             (= node (first tree)) (list node)
             :else (let [leads-to-node? #(if (= node (last %)) %)]
                     (conj (some leads-to-node? (map (partial find-path node) (rest tree)))
                           (first tree)))))

          (pull-path [path tree]
            (if (empty? path) 
              tree
              (let [current-node (first path)
                    root (first tree)
                    children (rest tree)
                    root-is-node? #(if (= current-node (first %)) %)
                    target-subtree (some root-is-node? children)]
                (pull-path (rest path)
                           (append-back target-subtree (conj (remove root-is-node? children)
                                                             root))))))]
    (pull-path (rest (find-path node tree)) tree)))
