(fn reparent [new-root tree-to-transform]
  (let [add-subtree (fn add-subtree [tree target new-branch]
                      (cond
                        (symbol? tree) tree
                        (= target (first tree)) (concat tree new-branch)
                        :else (map #(add-subtree % target new-branch) tree)))]
    (if (= new-root (first tree-to-transform)) 
      tree-to-transform
      (loop [subtree (rest tree-to-transform)]
        (if (empty? subtree) 
          nil
          (if-let [reparented-subtree (reparent new-root (first subtree))]
            (add-subtree 
              reparented-subtree 
              (first (first subtree)) 
              (list (remove #(and (seq? %) (= (first (first subtree)) (first %))) tree-to-transform)))
            (recur (rest subtree))))))))

(fn __ [elem tree]
  (let [flatten (fn fl [tree parent]
                  (let [[node & kids] tree
                        m {node [parent (map first kids)]}
                        km (map #(fl % node) kids)]
                    (apply merge m km)))
        re-parent (fn rp [elem m visited-elements]
                    (let [[parent kids] (get m elem)
                          unvisited-kids (remove visited-elements kids)
                          kids-results (map #(rp % m (conj visited-elements elem)) unvisited-kids)
                          parent-result (if (and parent (not (visited-elements parent)))
                                          [(rp parent m (conj visited-elements elem))]
                                          [])]
                      (concat [elem] kids-results parent-result)))]
    (re-parent elem (flatten tree nil) #{})

    ))

(fn pull-tree [node tree]
  (->>
   (tree-seq next rest tree)
   (filter #(some #{node} (flatten %)))
   (reduce (fn [parent-tree node-tree] 
             (let [rest-tree (remove #{node-tree} parent-tree)]
               (concat node-tree [rest-tree]))))))

(fn [newroot tree]
  (letfn [(postorder
            [f [name & subtrees]]
            (concat
             (when subtrees (mapcat #(postorder f %) subtrees))
             [(f {:name name :kids (if subtrees (map first subtrees) [])})]))]
    (let [elements (into [] (postorder (fn [{n :name}] n) tree))
          _ (prn elements)

                                                   [name k]))
                                               tree))
          old-parents (into {} (map (fn [[k v]] [v k]) connections))
          all-links (apply merge-with into
                           (map (fn [[l r]] {l #{r} r #{l}}) connections))]
      (letfn [(newtree
                ([root] (newtree root #{root}))
                ([root seen]
                   (let [links (get all-links root [])
                         kids (sort-by rank (filter #(not (seen %)) links))
                         old-root (old-parents root)
                         has-root? (some #{old-root} kids)
                         kids (if has-root?
                                (conj
                                 (vec (remove #{old-root} kids))
                                 old-root)
                                kids)
                         newseen (into seen kids)]
                     (cons root (map #(newtree % newseen) kids)))))]
        (newtree newroot)))))

(fn F [a p [n & C :as t]]
  (let [A #(if a (concat % [a]) %)]
    (if (= p n)
      (A t)
      (let [[c] (filter #((set (flatten %)) p) C)
            [o & D :as T] (F (remove #{c} t) p c)]
        (cons o (map #(if (= (first %) n) (A %) %) D))))))

(fn [x y] (let [path-to-pivot              (fn [pivot tree]
                                             (loop [[tree i path parent-frame] [tree 0 [] nil]]
                                               (cond
                                                 (>= i (count tree))
                                                 (if (nil? parent-frame) nil (recur parent-frame))
                                                 (vector? (tree i))
                                                 (recur [(tree i) 0 (conj path i) [tree (inc i) path parent-frame]])
                                                 (= pivot (tree i))
                                                 path
                                                 :else
                                                 (recur [tree (inc i) path parent-frame]))))

                vec-remove                 (fn [v idx]
                                             (into (subvec v 0 idx) (subvec v (inc idx))))

                tree-without-pivot-subtree (fn [tree path-to-pivot]
                                             (let [new-subtree (vec-remove (get-in tree (drop-last path-to-pivot)) (last path-to-pivot))]
                                               (if (= 1 (count path-to-pivot))
                                                 new-subtree
                                                 (assoc-in tree (drop-last path-to-pivot) new-subtree))))

                rotate                     (fn rotate [pivot tree]
                                             (let [tree          (clojure.walk/postwalk #(if (list? %) (vec %) %) tree)

                                                   path-to-pivot (path-to-pivot pivot tree)]

                                               (if (empty? path-to-pivot)
                                                 tree
                                                 (let [parent-of-pivot            (first (get-in tree (drop-last path-to-pivot)))

                                                       tree-without-pivot-subtree (tree-without-pivot-subtree tree path-to-pivot)]

                                                   (conj (get-in tree path-to-pivot)
                                                         (rotate parent-of-pivot tree-without-pivot-subtree))))
                                               ))]
            (rotate x y)))

(fn [node tree]
  (let [path-to
        (loop [acc [] t tree]
          (let [acc' (conj acc t)]
            (if (= node (first t))
              acc'
              (recur acc' (first (filter #(some #{node} (flatten %)) (rest t)))))))
        rm (fn [n [f & r]]
             (let [[hd tl] (split-with #(not= n %) r)]
               (cons f (concat hd (rest tl)))))
        merge-once (fn [x y] (concat y [(rm y x)]))]
    (reduce merge-once path-to)))

(fn [new-root tree]
  (let [chain ((fn find-chain [[x & xs :as node]]
                 (if (= x new-root)
                   (list node)
                   (first
                     (for [child xs
                           :let [chain (find-chain child)]
                           :when (not (nil? chain))
                           :let [excl (ffirst chain)
                                 children (filter #(not= (first %) excl) xs)
                                 node (conj children x)]]
                       (conj chain node))))) tree)]
    (if (nil? chain)
      tree
      (reduce #(concat %2 (list %1)) chain))))

(fn [tag tree]
  (letfn [(locate [n [tag & children :as node] trace]
            (cond
              (= n tag) (conj trace tag)
              (nil? children) nil
              :else (some identity (map #(locate n % (conj trace tag)) children))))
          (invert [path tree parents]
            (cond
              (= 1 (count path)) (concat tree parents)
              (= 0 (count path)) nil
              :else
              (let [name (first path)
                    path' (rest path)
                    child (first (filter #(= (first path') (first %)) (rest tree)))
                    others (filter #(not= (first path') (first %)) (rest tree))
                    node' (into [name] (concat others parents))]
                (invert path' child [node']))))]
    (invert (locate tag tree []) tree [])))

(fn [p x]
    (let [prune (partial remove #(= % '(nil)))]
      (loop [p             p
             [t & c :as x] x
             pt            '(nil)]
        (if (= p t)  
          (prune (concat x (list pt)))
          (let [{[s] true o false} (group-by #(contains? (set (flatten %)) p) c)]
            (recur p s (prune (concat (cons t o) (list pt)))))))))

(fn [r t]
  (let [flatin (fn flatin [[k & ch]]
                 (if (empty? ch)
                   (list k)
                   (apply concat (flatin (first ch)) [k] (map flatin (rest ch)))))
        flat (flatin t)
        srt (fn [a b] (compare (.indexOf flat a) (.indexOf flat b)))
        ttg (fn ttg [n p]
              (let [k (first n)
                    ch (rest n)
                    adj {k (set (if (nil? p) (map first ch) (cons p (map first ch))))}]
                (reduce merge adj (map #(ttg % k) ch))))
        graph (ttg t nil)
        gtt (fn gtt [n g v]
              (let [nv (conj (clojure.set/union v (g n)) n)
                    ch (sort srt (apply disj (g n) v))]
                (cons n (map #(gtt % g nv) ch))))]
    (gtt r graph #{})))

              :else (some 
                      (fn [[i st]] (ptn st (concat (take (inc i) t) (drop (+ 2 i) t) (list p))))
                      (map-indexed vector st))))]
    (if (next t)
      (some 
        (fn [[i st]] (ptn st (concat (take (inc i) t) (drop (+ 2 i) t))))
        (map-indexed vector (rest t)))
      t)))

(fn [root t]
  (letfn [(path [t]
            (cond (= root (first t)) (list root)
                  (empty? (rest t)) nil
                  :else (let [res (reduce #(or % %2) (map path (rest t)))]
                          (if res (cons (first t) res) nil))))
          (reparent [trunk branch surplus]
            (if (empty? surplus) (concat trunk (list branch))
                (let [nxt (first surplus)
                      res (reduce (fn [accum cur]
                                    (if (= nxt (first cur)) (cons cur accum)
                                        (concat accum (list cur))))
                                  nil (rest trunk))]
                  (reparent (first res)
                            (cons (first trunk) (concat (rest res) (if (empty? branch) nil (list branch))))
                            (rest surplus)))))]
    (if (= root (first t)) t
        (reparent t nil (rest (path t))))))

(fn [pickup whole-tree]
    (let [node? symbol?
          tree? (fn tree? [tree] (and (seq? tree)
                                      (node? (first tree))
                                      (every? tree? (rest tree))))
          contained? (fn [item coll] {:pre[item #_not-for-null-false-or-nil]}
                       (some (partial = item) coll))
          subtree-seq (tree-seq seq? rest whole-tree)
          root (first whole-tree)
          node-subtrees-result? (fn [[node subtrees :as whole]]
                                  (and (or (= (count whole) 2) (empty? whole))
                                       (or (empty? whole) (and (node? node) (seq? subtrees)))
                                       (every? (some-fn tree? node?) subtrees))) ;every? works with coll being nil
          tree-or-node? (fn [item] (or (tree? item) (node? item)))
          subtree-seq-item? tree-or-node?
          node-subtrees (fn [seq-item] {:pre [(subtree-seq-item? seq-item)] :post [(node-subtrees-result? %)]}
                             (if (tree? seq-item)
                               [(first seq-item) (rest seq-item)]
                               []))
          subtrees (reduce (fn [res seq-item] ;subtrees is a map: node parent => seq of subtrees; But leaf nodes don't have any entry!
                             (let [pair (node-subtrees seq-item)]
                               (if (empty? pair)
                                 res
                                 (conj res pair))))
                           {} subtree-seq)
          _ (assert (= (subtrees (first whole-tree)) (rest whole-tree)))
          _ (assert (every? node? (keys subtrees)))
          _ (assert (every? seq?  (vals subtrees)))
          _ (assert (every? (partial every? (some-fn tree? node?)) (vals subtrees)))
          tree-node (fn [tree] {:pre [(tree-or-node? tree)] :post[ (node? %)]}
                     (if (node? tree) tree (first tree)))
          tree-or-node (fn [node] {:pre [(node? node)] :post [(= (tree-node %) node)]} ;node => subtree. Re-constitue. Not efficient, but OK for our goal.
                         (let [subs (subtrees node)]
                           (if subs
                             (concat (list node) subs)
                             node)))
          node-of (fn [tree-or-node] {:pre [(tree-or-node? tree-or-node)] :post [(node? %)]}
                    (if (node? tree-or-node)
                      tree-or-node
                      (first tree-or-node))
                    )
          node-parent? (fn [[node parent :as pair]] {:pre [(= (count pair) 2) (node? node)]}
                         (and (node? parent)
                              (some (partial = node) (map node-of (subtrees parent)))))
          nodes-parents (fn [seq-item] {:pre [(subtree-seq-item? seq-item)] :post [(map? %) (every? node-parent? %)]} ;map: node => node parent
                          (if (tree? seq-item)
                            (let [parent (first seq-item)]
                              (assert (node? parent))
                              (reduce (fn [res subtree] {:pre [(map? res) (subtree-seq-item? subtree)]}
                                        (assoc res (node-of subtree) parent))
                                      {} (rest seq-item)))
                            {})
                          )
          parents (reduce (fn [res seq-item] ;parents is a map: node child => node direct parent. No entry for root.
                            (into res (nodes-parents seq-item)))
                          {} subtree-seq)
          _ (assert (every? (fn [[child parent :as pair]] {:pre [(node? child) (node? parent)]}
                              (node-parent? pair))
                            parents))
          direct-of? (fn [tree node] {:pre[(tree? tree) (node? node)]}
                       (or (contained? node tree)
                           (some (comp (partial = node) first) tree)))
          ancestors-result? (fn ancestors-result? [grandchild ancestors] {:pre [(node? grandchild)]};ancestors' order: immediate first, elder second
                              (assert (= (nil? ancestors) (= grandchild root)))
                              (or (nil? ancestors)
                                  (let [first-ancestor (first ancestors)]
                                    (and (= (parents grandchild) first-ancestor)
                                         (ancestors-result? first-ancestor (next ancestors))))))
          ancestors (fn ancestors [grandchild] {:pre [(node? grandchild)] :post [(ancestors-result? grandchild %)]} ;Return a seq of nodes: immediate parent first, elder second; or nil
                      (let [parent (parents grandchild)]
                        (if parent
                          (cons parent (ancestors parent))
                          nil
                          )))
          remove-child (fn [tree child-node] {:pre  [(tree? tree) (node? child-node)]
                                              :post [(tree? %)]}
                         (filter (complement (comp (partial = child-node) node-of)) tree))
          pickup-ancestors (ancestors pickup)
          pickup-subtrees (subtrees pickup)
          ;pickup-tree (seq (conj [pickup]))
          pickup-tree-without-ancestors (concat (list pickup) pickup-subtrees)
          #_ancestors-underOBS #_(seq (reduce (fn [res ancestor-seq]
                                          )
                                          () ancestors))
          ; 1. (nil? ancestors) ==> nil
          ; 2. ancestors is a seq of trees
          _ '((parent-symb (other-child #_nieces) (child #_own-children #_to_remove)                              #_siblings)
              (grand-parent-symb (uncle #_cousins) (parent-symb #_etc #_to_remove)                       #_uncles)
              (great-grandparent-symb (grand-uncle #_etc) (grand-parent-symb #_extended-fam #_to_remove) #_grand-uncles)
              #_etc)
          ; => one seq (flatter) but with a deep structure
          _ '(parent-symb (other-child #_nieces) #_child-removed #_siblings
                           (grand-parent-symb (uncle #_etc) #_parent-removed #_uncles
                                              (great-grandparent-symb (grand-uncle #_etc) #_etc
                                                                      #_etc)))
          ancestors-under ((fn upside-down [child ancestors] ;child is used only for removal, it won't be in the returned sub-structure. ancestors is non-empty, or nil (hence you can use outer map's value: (ancestors child)).
                             {:pre [(node? child) (or (nil? ancestors)
                                                      (every? node? ancestors))]
                              :post [(or (nil? %) (tree? %))]}
                              (if-let [parent (first ancestors)]
                                (let [parent-separated (remove-child (tree-or-node parent) child)
                                      elders (next ancestors)]
                                  ;(println "parent-sep" parent-separated "elders" elders)
                                  (if elders
                                    (seq (conj (vec parent-separated)
                                            (upside-down (node-of parent) elders)))
                                    parent-separated))))
                           pickup (ancestors pickup))
          ]
      (if ancestors-under
        (seq (conj (vec pickup-tree-without-ancestors) ancestors-under))
        pickup-tree-without-ancestors)
      ))

(fn [nr tree]

(fn re-parent [new-root tree]
  (let [graph ((fn build [[cur-node & children :as subtree]]
                 (if (empty? children)
                   {cur-node '()}
                   (let [child-edges (apply merge (for [c children] (build c)))
                         this-edges {cur-node (map first children)}
                         back-edges (into {} (for [c children] [(first c) [cur-node]]))]
                     (merge-with concat child-edges this-edges back-edges)))) tree)
        dfs (fn dfs [cur-v visited]
              (let [children (get graph cur-v)
                    next-visited (conj visited cur-v)]
                (list* cur-v
                       (for [c children :when (nil? (visited c))]
                         (dfs c next-visited)))))]
    (dfs new-root #{})))

                            (if (not-empty sub-path)
                              (cons (first tree) (first sub-path)))))) n t)]
           (reduce (fn [tree pivot]
                     (let [child-root (filter #(= (first %) pivot) (rest tree))
                           child-rest (filter #(not= (first %) pivot) (rest tree))]
                       (concat (first child-root) (list (cons (first tree) child-rest)))))

(fn [root tree]
  (letfn [(find-parent [r t]
            (if (> (count t) 1)
              (let [sub-tree (filter #(some #{r} %) (next t))]
                (if (seq sub-tree)
                  [(first t)]
                  (apply concat (map #(find-parent r %) (next t)))))))
          (find-children [r t]
            (if (= r (first t))
              (map first (next t))
              (apply concat (map #(find-children r %) (next t)))))
          (step [r t s]
            (let [filtered-children (filter #(nil? (s %)) (concat (find-children r t) (find-parent r t)))]
              (cons r (map #(step % t (into s filtered-children)) filtered-children))))]
(step root tree #{root})))

(fn [node-to-find [node & children :as tree]]
    (if (= node-to-find node) tree
        (letfn [(remove-child [parent child-index]
                              (concat (take (inc child-index) parent) (drop (+ 2 child-index) parent)))
                (append-tree [tree new-tree]
                        (concat tree (list new-tree)))
                (append-parent [tree parent index]
                               (append-tree tree (remove-child parent index)))
                (pull [node-to-find [node & children :as tree] parent index]
                      (let [tree-pulled (append-parent tree parent index)]
                      (if (= node-to-find node) tree-pulled
                          (first (keep-indexed #(pull node-to-find %2 tree-pulled %1) children)))))]
            (first (keep-indexed #(pull node-to-find %2 tree %1) children)))))

(fn find-node
  ([node tree]
   (find-node node tree tree))
  ([node tree possible-solution]
   (if (= node (first tree))
     possible-solution
     (first (keep not-empty
                  (map (fn [child]
                         (let [clean (remove #{child} possible-solution)]
                           (find-node node child (concat child (list clean))))) (rest tree)))))))

(fn rep [new-root tree] 
  (letfn [(rotate [tree]
  (let [root (first tree)
        child-branches (rest tree)]
    (if (empty? child-branches) [root] 
      (loop [child-branches-iter child-branches 
             prev-part [] 
             res []]
        (if (empty? child-branches-iter) res
          (recur (rest child-branches-iter) 
                 (conj prev-part (first child-branches-iter)) 
                 (conj res 
                       (conj 
                         (vec (first child-branches-iter)) 
                         (into [root] 
                               (into (rest child-branches-iter) prev-part))))))))))
]
  (some (fn [s] (some
    (fn [t] (if (= (first t) new-root) t)) s)) 
    (iterate #(mapcat rotate %) [tree]))) 
)

(fn [root tree]
  (let [
    get_map (fn get_map [p, [n & cs]]  ; (parent, node)
                    (concat [[n (cons p (map first cs))]]
                      (mapcat #(if (seq %) (get_map n %)) cs)))
    old_map  (into {} (get_map nil tree))
    up (fn up [sym pa tmap]
          (let [[p & cs] (tmap sym)
                 new-cs (filter #(not= pa %) cs)]  ; delete the new parent
            (if p
               (recur p sym  (conj tmap {sym `(~pa ~@new-cs ~p)}))
               (conj tmap {sym `(~pa ~@new-cs)}) )))   
   new_map  (up root nil old_map)
   ->tree (fn ->tree [sym]
                (if (nil? sym)
                  nil
                  (let [[p & subt] (new_map sym)]
                    (cons sym (keep ->tree subt)))))]
  (->tree root)))

(fn [r t]
   (letfn [(parent [x]
             "Find the parent of the given node x."
             (ffirst (filter (fn [st] (and (sequential? st)
                                          (some #{x} (map first (rest st)))))
                             (tree-seq sequential? seq t))))
           (subtree [x]
             "Return the subtree rooted at x."
             (first (filter #(and (sequential? %) (= x (first %)))
                            (tree-seq sequential? seq t))))
           (reparent [x ignore]
             "Reparent node x, ignoring the given set of already-reparented children."
             (concat
              ; The node label
              [x]
              ; Node's reparented children, ignoring ignore set
              (remove #(ignore (first %)) (rest (subtree x)))
              ; Reparented parent, ignoring self
              (when-let [pt (parent x)]
                [(reparent pt (conj ignore x))])))]
     (reparent r #{})))

(fn tree-reparent
  [n t]
  (letfn [(tree-contains? [t n]
            (and (or (= (first t) n)
                     (some #(tree-contains? % n) (next t)))
                 t))
          (append-below [t n more]
            (if (= (first t) n)
              (concat t (list more))
              (cons (first t)
                    (map #(append-below % n more) (rest t)))))]
    (if (= (first t) n)
      t
      (let [new-root-side (some #(tree-contains? % n) (rest t))
            new-tree (cons (first t)
                           (remove #(tree-contains? % n) (rest t)))
            append-child (first new-root-side)
            new-top (tree-reparent n new-root-side)]
        (append-below new-top append-child new-tree)))))

(fn tree-reparenting
  [the-node original-tree]
  (letfn [(tree-contains?
            [tree x]
            (if (= x (first tree))
              true
              (some #(tree-contains? % x) (rest tree))))]
    (loop [tree original-tree]
      (if (= (first tree) the-node)
        tree
        (let [sub-node (first (filter #(tree-contains? % the-node) (rest tree)))
              new-parent (filter #(not= % sub-node) tree)]
          (recur (concat sub-node [new-parent])))))))

        (if (empty? path)
          tree
          (let [t1 (first (filter #(= (first path) (first %)) (rest tree)))
                t2 (remove #(= % t1) tree)]
            (recur (concat t1 (list t2)) (rest path))))))))

(fn [n tree]
  (let [remove-branch (fn [tree n]
                        (let [[head & branch] tree]
                          (doall
                           (cons head
                                 (filter #(not= n (first %)) branch)))))
        
        get-branch (fn [tree n]
                     (let [[head & branch] tree]
                       (some #(when (= n (first %)) %) branch)))
        
        append-branch (fn [tree b] (doall (concat tree (cons b '()))))
        
        track-node (fn track-node [tree n]
                     (let [[head & branch] tree]
                       (if (= n head)
                       	 (list n)
                       	 (let [tracks (map #(conj (track-node % n) head) branch)
                               track (some #(when (contains? (set %) n) %) tracks)]
                           (if (nil? track)
                             '()
                             track)))))
        
        
        track (track-node tree n)]
    (reduce (fn [acc n]
              (append-branch (get-branch acc n) 
                             (remove-branch acc n)))
            tree
            (rest track))))

(fn reparent [newr [root & children :as tree]]
  (letfn [(has-node? [node [root & children]]
                     (when root
                       (or (= node root)
                           (some (partial has-node? node) children))))]
    (when tree
      (if (= root newr)
        tree
        (let [grouped (group-by (partial has-node? newr) children)
              r-subtree (first (grouped true))
              others (seq (grouped nil))]
          (if r-subtree
            (let [rotated-root (list (conj others root))
                   rotated (conj (concat (rest r-subtree) rotated-root ) (first r-subtree))]
              (reparent newr rotated))
            tree))))))

(fn tr [key tree]

  (let [allnodes (tree-seq seq? identity tree)
        haschild (fn [node] (some #(= key %) (flatten node)))
        node_parents (reverse (filter #(haschild %) allnodes))
        remove-node (fn [p c] (apply list (filter #(not= c %) p)))
        cleaned (map-indexed (fn [idx value]
                               (if (= 0 idx) value
                                 (remove-node value (nth node_parents (dec idx)))))
      node_parents)
        ]
    (loop [acc (last cleaned) r (drop-last cleaned)]
      (if (empty? r) acc
        (recur (concat (last r) (list acc)) (drop-last r))
        ))))

(fn reparent [node tree]
  (let [ts (tree-seq #(> (count %) 1) rest tree)
        children (apply hash-map (mapcat #(vector (first %) (map first (rest %))) ts))
        parent (apply hash-map (mapcat (fn [[cdr p]] (mapcat #(vector % p) cdr)) 
                                        (clojure.set/map-invert children)))
        without (fn [r coll] (remove #(= r %) coll))    
        other-branches (fn [r] (filter #(not= r (first %))(rest tree)))
        walk-down (fn walk-down [e] (let [ch (children e)]
                               (if (nil? ch) [e]
                                 (concat [e] (map walk-down ch)))))
        walk-up (fn walk-up [c t] 
                  (let [p (parent c)
                        ch (children c)
                        sibs (map walk-down (without t ch))]
                       (if (nil? p) (cons c (other-branches t))
                         (concat (concat [c] sibs )[(walk-up p c)]))))]
        (walk-up node nil)))

(fn [x coll]
(letfn [(treevec [coll] (if (list? coll) (vec (map treevec coll)) coll))
        (vectree [coll] (if (vector? coll) (map vectree coll) coll))
        (fst [p coll] (when-let [[e & rst] coll] (if (p e) 0 (when-let [n (fst p rst)] (+ n 1)))))
        (nconj [coll x] (if x (conj coll x) coll))
        (nodegrab [coll]
              (let [vcoll (treevec coll)]
                (cond (= (first vcoll) x) (fn [y] (nconj vcoll y))
                      (= 1 (count vcoll)) vcoll
                      :else (let [recursevcoll (map #(nodegrab %) (rest vcoll))
                                  pos (fst (comp not vector?) recursevcoll)
                                  vcolls (vec recursevcoll)]
                                    (if pos (let [node (vcolls pos)
                                                  remf  (fn [z] (vec (concat (subvec vcoll 0 (inc pos)) (nconj (subvec vcoll (+ pos 2)) z))))]
                                                      (comp node remf))
                                            vcoll)))))] 
        (vectree ((nodegrab coll) nil))))

(fn to-top [node-name tree]
  (let [node (first (filter #(and (seq? %) (= (first %) node-name))
                            (tree-seq seq? seq tree)))
        parent (first (filter #(and (seq? %) (some (fn [c] (= node c)) (rest %)))
                              (tree-seq seq? seq tree)))]
    (if parent
      (concat node (list (remove #(= % node) (to-top (first parent) tree))))
      tree)))

(let [find-subtree
      (fn find-subtree [node tree]
        (let [[v & children] tree]
          (if (= node v) tree
              (some #(find-subtree node %) children))))
      remove-subtree
      (fn remove-subtree [node tree]
        (let [[v & children] tree]
          (if (nil? children) tree
              (let [filtered-children (filter (fn [[c & subc]]
                                                (not (= c node)))
                                              children)]
                (let [closed-children (map (fn [child]
                                             (remove-subtree node child))
                                           filtered-children)]
                  (conj closed-children v))))))
      find-path
      (fn find-path [node tree]
        (let [[v & children] tree]
          (if (= v node) (list v)
              (if (nil? children) nil
                  (conj (some #(find-path node %) children)
                        v)))))]
  (fn reparent-tree
    [node tree]
    (let [steps (rest (find-path node tree))]
      (if (empty? steps) tree
          (loop [[hs & ts] steps
                 curtree tree]
            (let [fst (find-subtree hs curtree)
                  rst (remove-subtree hs curtree)
                  newtree (reverse (conj (reverse fst) rst))]
              (if (nil? ts) newtree (recur ts newtree))))))))

(fn [r t]
    (letfn [(del [t c]
              (remove #(and (seq? %) (= c (nth % 0))) t))
            (add [[x & xs :as t] p c]
              (if (= x p)
                (concat t [c])
                (cons x (map #(add % p c) xs))))
            (tr [r [x & xs :as t]]
              (if (= r x) [t x]
                  (when-let [[st p] (first (filter #(do %) (map #(tr r %) xs)))]
                      [(add st p (del t p)) x])))]
    (nth (tr r t) 0)))

(fn [e s]
  (let [res (fn res [[x & xs]]
              (mapcat
                (fn [ys]
                  (conj (res ys) [x (first ys)]))
                xs))
        al-l (res s)
        ne-f (fn ne-f [i t]
               (let [ne-l (filter (fn [[a _]] (= a i)) t)
                     ne-r (filter (fn [[_ b]] (= b i)) t)
                     re (filter (fn [[a b]] (and (not= b i) (not= a i))) t)
                     ne (into (vec ne-l) ne-r)
                     ne-i (map (fn [[a b]] (if (= a i) b a)) ne)]
                 (if (empty? ne)
                    (list i)
                    (apply list i (map #(ne-f % re) ne-i)))))]
    (ne-f e al-l)))

(fn [n t]
  (->> t
       (tree-seq next rest)
       (filter #(some #{n} (flatten %)))
       (reduce (fn [a b] 
                 (concat b (list (remove #{b} a)))))))

(fn [n tree]
    (let [find
          (fn find [[root & children]]
            (cond (= root n) []
                  (empty? children) nil
                  :else (let [c (map find children)
                              i (.indexOf (map nil? c) false)]
                          (cons i (nth c i)))))]
      (loop [path (find tree)
             [root & children :as tree] tree]
        (if (empty? path)
          tree
          (recur
            (rest path)
            (let [i        (first path)
                  children (vec children)
                  [new-root & new-children] (nth children i)]
              (cons
                new-root
                (conj
                  (vec new-children)
                  (cons root (concat
                               (subvec children 0 i)
                               (subvec children (inc i))))))))))))

(fn [n tree]
    (letfn [(decompose [[p & children] res]
                      (if (seq children)
                        (reduce
                          (fn [acc child]
                            (update-in (decompose child acc) [:c-p] assoc (first child) p))
                          (update-in res [:p-c] assoc p children)
                          children)
                        res))
          (compose [n p-c c-p]
                    (let [children (p-c n)
                          ex-parent (c-p n)
                          siblings (remove #(= (first %) n) (p-c ex-parent))]
                      (concat [n] children 
                              (if ex-parent 
                                (list (compose ex-parent (assoc p-c ex-parent siblings) c-p)))  
                              )))]
      (let [{:keys [p-c c-p]} (decompose tree {})]
        (if p-c 
          (compose n p-c c-p)
          tree))))

(fn [ node-label tree]
  (letfn [
   (rec-find-node [[ nl & ch :as t] path] ;; path est un vecteur
    (cond
     (nil? nl) nil
     (= node-label nl) (conj path t)
     :else (first (filter (comp not empty?)
             (map #(rec-find-node %1 (conj path t)) ch)))))
   (add [t st]
    (if (nil? st) t (concat t [st])))
   (rec-re-parent [[ x y & xs :as p] r]
    (if (nil? y)
     (add x r)
     (let [nx (filter #(not= y %) x)] (recur (drop 1 p) (add nx r)))))
   ]
   (let [ p (rec-find-node tree [])]
    (rec-re-parent p nil))))

(fn [root tree]
  (letfn [(children [root tree]
            (if (= root (first tree))
              (map first (rest tree))
              (mapcat #(children root %) (rest tree))))
          (parent [root tree]
            (if (> (count tree) 1)
              (let [p (filter #(some #{root} %) (rest tree))]
                (if (seq p)
                  (cons (first tree) nil)
                  (mapcat #(parent root %) (rest tree))))))
          (rebase [root tree nodes]
            (let [ch (remove nodes (concat (children root tree)
                                           (parent root tree)))]
              (cons root
                    (map #(rebase % tree (into nodes ch)) ch))))]
    (rebase root tree #{root})))

(fn reparent
  ([root tree ptree]
   (if (= root (first tree))
     (concat (list root) (rest tree) (list ptree))
     (first (filter (comp not nil?) (map #(reparent root % (concat (list (first tree)) (concat (remove #{%} (rest tree)) (list ptree)))) (rest tree))))))
  ([root tree]
   (if (= root (first tree))
     (concat (list root) (rest tree))
     (first (filter (comp not nil?) (map #(reparent root % (concat (list (first tree)) (remove #{%} (rest tree)))) (rest tree)))))))

(fn rebalance
  ([element tree] (rebalance element tree nil))
  ([element tree sub-tree]
   (let [node-value (first tree)]
     (if (= element node-value)
       (if sub-tree (concat tree (list sub-tree)) tree)
       (loop [[current-child & remaining-children] (rest tree)
              preceding-children []]
         (if current-child
           (if-let [new-tree (rebalance
                               element
                               current-child
                               (concat
                                 (list node-value)
                                 preceding-children
                                 remaining-children
                                 (if sub-tree (list sub-tree))))]
             new-tree
             (recur
               remaining-children
               (conj preceding-children current-child)))))))))

 (loop [c t] (if (= d (first c))
 c (recur (fc c))))

(fn [node tree]
  (letfn [(find-path [node [root & children]]
            (cond (= node root) (list root)
                  (empty? children) nil
                  :else (when-let [p (some (partial find-path node) children)]
                          (cons root p))))
          (reparen [path tree]
            (if (empty? path)
              tree
              (let [root   (first tree)
                    pivot  (first path)
                    pchild (first (filter #(= (first %) pivot) (rest tree)))
                    other  (filter #(not= (first %) pivot) (rest tree))]
                (recur (rest path) (concat pchild (list (cons root other)))))))]
    (reparen (rest (find-path node tree)) tree)))

(fn re-parent-tree [new-root tree]
  (let [get-connections         (fn get-connections [res node]
                                  (let [root     (first node)
                                        children (vec (map first (rest node)))
                                        res      (conj res [root children])]
                                    (reduce (fn [res child]
                                              (get-connections res child))
                                            res
                                            (rest node))))
        root                    (first tree)
        connections             (get-connections [] tree)
        parents                 (reduce (fn [res conn]
                                          (reduce (fn [res child]
                                                    (assoc res child (first conn)))
                                                  res
                                                  (second conn)))
                                        {}
                                        connections)
        connections             (into (sorted-map) connections)
        _                       (prn parents)
        _                       (prn root)
        _                       (prn connections)
        re-parented-connections (loop [ans          connections
                                       current-node new-root]
                                  (let [cnp (get parents current-node)]
                                    (if cnp
                                      (recur (-> ans
                                                 (assoc current-node (conj (get ans current-node) cnp))
                                                 (assoc cnp (vec (remove #(= % current-node) (get ans cnp)))))
                                             cnp)
                                      ans)))
        rpt                     (fn rpt [res node]
                                  (let [res      (conj res node)
                                        children (get re-parented-connections node)]
                                    (reduce (fn [res child]
                                              (conj res (rpt [] child)))
                                            res
                                            children)))]
    (rpt [] new-root)))

(fn reparent-tree [p tree]
  (if (= p (first tree))
    tree
    (let [pred #(contains? (set (flatten %)) p)
          with-p (first (filter pred tree))
          without-p (remove pred tree)]
      (recur p (concat with-p [without-p])))))

(fn
  [newroot tree]
  (letfn [(parse-children [m parent cs]
            (if (seq cs)
              (let [h (first cs)
                    t (rest cs)
                    [p ss] (m parent)
                    ss' (conj ss (first h))
                    m' (assoc m parent [p ss'])
                    m'' (parse-tree m' h parent)]
                (recur m'' parent t))
              m))
          (parse-tree [m tree parent]
            (if (seq tree)
              (let [h (first tree)
                    t (rest tree)
                    m' (assoc m h [parent []])]
                (parse-children m' h t))
              m))
          (tree-to-vector [m root]
            (let [[_ cs] (m root)]
              (apply vector root (map (partial tree-to-vector m) cs))))
          (reparent [m node newparent]
            (let [[oldparent cs] (m node)
                  [m' cs'] (if oldparent
                             [(reparent m oldparent node) (conj cs oldparent)]
                             [m cs])
                  cs'' (remove (partial = newparent) cs')]
              (assoc m' node [newparent cs''])))]
    (tree-to-vector (reparent (parse-tree {} tree nil) newroot nil) newroot)))

(fn [r tree]
  (let [dfs (fn self [t]
              (if (= r (first t))
                (with-meta (list t) {:found true})
                (let [children (map self (rest t))
                      groups (group-by #((meta %) :found) children)]
                  (if (groups true)
                    (with-meta
                      (cons
                        (cons (first t) (groups false))
                        (first (groups true)))
                      {:found true})
                    (with-meta t {:found false})))))]
    (reduce #(concat %2 (list %1)) (dfs tree))))

(fn hang [el tree]
  (let [good? #(and (coll? %) (= el (first %)))
        goal-node  ((fn attach-parent-and-find [tree]
                      (cond (good? tree) tree
                             (coll? tree) (->> (map #(attach-parent-and-find (with-meta % {:parent tree})) tree)
                                               (remove nil?)
                                               (first))
                       :else nil))
                      tree)
        remove-node (fn [tree node]
                       (with-meta (remove #(and (coll? %) (= (first %) (first node))) tree)
                         (meta tree)))
        hang-cur (fn hang-cur [tree]
                   (let [par (:parent (meta tree))]
                     (if (nil? par)
                       tree
                       (concat tree [(hang-cur (remove-node par tree))]))))]
    (hang-cur goal-node)))

(fn [node root]
  (let [get-l (fn [x] 
          (when (sequential? x) (first x)))
        remove-node (fn [node tree]
          (remove #(= (get-l %) node) tree))
        reparent (fn [tree node]
          (concat (first (filter #(= (get-l %) node) tree)) (list (remove-node node tree))))
        find-node (fn [node tree]
          (loop [tovisit [{:node tree :path []}]]
            (println tovisit)
            (if (= node (get-l (:node (first tovisit))))
              (conj (:path (first tovisit)) node)
              (recur
                (into (rest tovisit) (map (fn [x] {:node x :path (conj (:path (first tovisit)) (get-l (:node (first tovisit))))})
                  (rest (:node (first tovisit)))))))))]
    (reduce reparent root
      (rest (find-node node root)))))

(fn reparent
   [new-parent tree]
   (letfn [(new-parent-in-branch [branch]
             (reduce (fn [in-branch b]
                       (cond (= b new-parent) true
                             (coll? b) (or in-branch (new-parent-in-branch b))
                             :else in-branch)) false branch))]
     (println tree)
     (cond (= new-parent (first tree)) tree
           :else (let [branch-with-parent (first (filter new-parent-in-branch (rest tree)))
                       branches-without-parent (filter (comp not new-parent-in-branch) (rest tree))]
                    (reparent new-parent (concat branch-with-parent (list (concat (list (first tree)) branches-without-parent))))
                   ))))

(fn split-x [x tree] (letfn [
	(split [tree] (let [
		theroot (first tree)
		childs (next tree)]
		(if (= x theroot) [[] [tree]] (let [
			sub (map split childs)
			sub1 (mapcat first sub)
			sub2 (mapcat second sub)]
			(if (seq sub2)
                [[] (conj sub2 (cons theroot sub1))]
                [[(cons theroot sub1)] []])))))
    (assemble2 [tree newroot] (concat newroot [tree]))
    (assemble [forest] (reduce assemble2 forest))]
	(assemble (second (split tree)))))

(fn reparent-tree
  [new-root [root & childs :as tree]]
  (letfn [(childs-without-child
            [childs child]
            (remove #(= child (first %)) childs))

          (traverse
            [root childs parent-without-me search-symbol]
            (cond
              (= root search-symbol)
              (let [new-childs (concat childs [parent-without-me])]
                (if (or (empty? new-childs) (and (= 1 (count new-childs)) (not (ffirst new-childs))))
                  [root]
                  (cons root new-childs)))

              (nil? childs)
              false

              :else
              (let [search-childs (map
                                   (fn [[f & r :as child]]
                                     (traverse f r (concat [root] (childs-without-child childs f)) search-symbol))
                                   childs)
                    val           (some (fn [x] (if x
                                                  x
                                                  false)) search-childs)]
                
                (if val
                  (if (empty? parent-without-me)
                    val
                    (let [l         (last val)
                          bl        (butlast val)
                          to-append (conj (vec l) parent-without-me)]
                      (conj (vec bl) to-append)))
                  false))))]
    
    (traverse root childs [] new-root)))

(fn [t g]
  (letfn [(f [t g]
            (if (= t (first g))
              (list g)
              (when-let [[new-root sub-tree]
                         (some #(when-let [new-root (f t %)] [new-root %]) (rest g))]
                (conj new-root (remove #{sub-tree} g)))))]
    (reduce (fn [r t] (conj (vec t) r)) (f t g))))

(fn [n t]
  (let [f (fn f [r v]
				(let [m (into (vec (filter #(= r (first %)) v))  (filter #(= r (second %)) v))
					  n (remove (set m) v)
					  s (filter #(not= % r) (flatten m))]
					(if (empty? m)
						(list r)
						(cons r (map #(f % n) s)))))]
		(f n (loop [r [t] v []]
				(if-let [f (first r)]
					(if (= 1 (count f))
						(recur (next r) v)
						(recur (into (rest f) (rest r)) (into v (map #(vector (first f) (first %)) (rest f)))))
					v)))))

(fn tree-reparent [n tree]
  "This could be a lot prettier, but whatever. Not amused by this exercise."
  (letfn [(tree-or-leaf-eq [node tree]
            (or (= tree node)
                (and (coll? tree)
                     (= (first tree) node))))
          (find-node [node tree]
            (if (not (coll? tree))
              false
              (if (= (first tree) node)
                tree
                (some (partial find-node node) (rest tree)))))
          (parent-of [node tree]
            (if (not (coll? tree))
              false
              (if (> (count tree) 1)
                (if (some (partial tree-or-leaf-eq node) (rest tree))
                  tree
                  (some (partial parent-of node) (rest tree)))
                false)))
          (add-child [tree child]
            (concat tree (list child)))
          (detach-child [tree child]
            (concat (list (first tree)) (remove (partial tree-or-leaf-eq child) (rest tree))))
          (detach-node [node tree]
            (if (coll? tree)
              (concat (list (first tree)) (map (partial detach-node node)
                                               (remove (partial tree-or-leaf-eq node) (rest tree))))
              tree))]
    (let [parent (parent-of n tree)
          this-tree (find-node n tree)
          rest-of-tree (detach-node n tree)]
      (if (nil? parent)
        tree
        (if (= (first tree) n)
          tree
          (add-child this-tree (tree-reparent (first parent) rest-of-tree)))))))

(fn solve
  ([node tree]
   (solve node tree nil))
  ([node tree attach]
   (let [[parent & children] tree
         attach-list (if attach (list attach) ())]
     (if (= node parent)
       (concat tree attach-list)
       (->> (for [child children]
              (let [others (remove #{child} children)
                    attach (concat (cons parent others) attach-list)]
                (solve node child attach)))
            (filter identity)
            first)))))

#(let [f first l filter
       c (fn c [t] (and (seq? t)
                           (or (= % (f t))
                               (some c t))))]
    (loop [t %2]
      (if (= % (f t)) t
          (recur
           (concat
            (f (l c t))
            [(l (complement c) t)])))))

(fn reparent [new-parent root]
  (letfn [(goal? [[val]] (= new-parent val))
          (leaf? [tree] (= 1 (count tree)))
          (tree-val [tree] (first tree))
          (children [tree] (rest tree))
          (subtree [tree subtree node]
            "Build a new subtree from a previous subtree and
             this node's parent, removing the node from its
             original position if present"
            (concat
              (list (tree-val tree))
              (filter (complement #(= node %)) (children tree))
              (if (seq subtree)
                (list subtree)
                '())))
          (queue [& vals]
            (apply conj clojure.lang.PersistentQueue/EMPTY vals))]
  (loop [q (queue {:tree root :new-tree '() })]
    (when-let [{:keys [tree new-tree]} (peek q)]
      (cond
        (goal? tree) (subtree tree new-tree tree)
        (leaf? tree) (recur (pop q))
        :else
        (let [wrap (fn [t] {:tree t
                            :new-tree (subtree tree new-tree t)})]
          (recur (->> (children tree)
                      (map wrap)
                      (apply conj (pop q))))))))))

(fn reparent [new_root tree]
  (letfn [
          (unsplice [node value]
            (let [grouping (group-by #(= (first %) value) (rest node))]
              [(first (get grouping true)) (cons (first node) (get grouping false))]
              ))
          (rotate [node child]
            (if (= child (first node))
              node
              (let [[new_root unspliced] (unsplice node child)]
                (concat new_root (list unspliced)))))
          (subpath [node [node_value & node_children] path]
            (cond
              (= node node_value) (conj path node)
              (empty? node_children) nil
              :else (reduce #(or %1 %2) (map #(subpath node % (conj path node_value)) node_children))))
          (find-path [node tree] (subpath node tree []))
          ]
  (let [path (find-path new_root tree)]
    (do (println "path -> " path)
        (reduce #(rotate %1 %2) tree path)))))

(fn tree-reparent
  [needle tree]
  (letfn [(dfs-backstack
            ([needle [val & children :as root] backstack]
             (cond
               (= needle val) (conj backstack root)
               (nil? children) 'nil
               :else (first (filter identity (map #(dfs-backstack needle % (conj backstack root)) children)))))
            ([needle root] (dfs-backstack needle root [])))
          (invert-tree
            ([[x & xs :as path] current-child]
             (if (nil? path) current-child
                 (invert-tree xs
                              (let [new-parent (filter (partial not= (first xs)) x)]
                                (if (nil? current-child)
                                  new-parent
                                  (concat new-parent (list current-child)))))))
            ([xs] (invert-tree xs 'nil)))]
    (invert-tree (dfs-backstack needle tree))))

(fn pull
  ([target tree]
   (pull target tree nil))
  ([target [label & children] parent]
   (if (= label target)
     (remove nil? (concat [label]
                          children
                          [parent]))

                        (if (empty? hit-list)

                          ))))))]
    (second (work tree))

(fn [new-root tree]
  (letfn [(prewalk [[node & children :as tree]]
            ;; A recursive function to transverse the tree and return an original
            ;; subtree or a modified one (if the new root is in it).
            ;; NOTE: a breadth first search, instead of this depth first search,
            ;; could be a better solution.
            (if (= node new-root)
              ;; The current node (and possible root of a subtree) is the target
              ;; node. Here we return the original root of this possible subtree (in
              ;; this case, this subtree is the same as the original.
              [node tree]
              ;; We can have normal leaves, original subtrees or modified subtrees.
              (let [walks (seq (map prewalk children)) ; recursive call
                    ;; The results of these walks can be three possibilities:
                    ;; nil ('node' is a leaf), a tree (a normal list of nodes)
                    ;; or a vector [original-root-node-of modified-subtree].
                    reg-children (remove vector? walks) ; regular children (original subtrees).
                    ;; Modified subtree. 'n' the original root of the modified
                    ;; subtree 't'.
                    [n t] (first (filter vector? walks))]
                (if-not n
                  ;; If we don't have any modified child, we can just return
                  ;; this original subtree.
                  tree
                  ;; If we have modified child, we need to "move down" 'node'
                  ;; and its unmodified children as a child of 'n' and return
                  ;; the original root of this subtree and the new (modified)
                  ;; subtree.
                  ;; We need to search for it in the modified
                  ;; subtree.
                  [node (move-down (list* node reg-children) n t)]))))
          (move-down [cur-tree new-parent-node uptree]
            ;; Moves the tree 'cur-tree' to a leaf of 'new-parent-node', which is
            ;; somewhere inside the 'uptree'.
            (letfn [(f [[n & chs :as t]]
                      ;; Recursive function that works in a very similar way as
                      ;; 'prewalk'.
                      (if (= n new-parent-node)
                        ;; We found the new root of 'cur-tree'. We need to put at the
                        ;; rightest place.
                        (concat t [cur-tree])
                        ;; We just return the tree as we found it.
                        (conj (map f chs) n)))]
              (f uptree)))]
    (second (prewalk tree))))

          get-other #(if (= (first %2) %1) (last %2) (first %2) )
          make-tree (fn make-tree [tuples root]
                      (let [
                            tuples-grouped (group-by #(clojure.set/subset? #{root} (set %)) tuples)                            [children remaining] (map tuples-grouped [true false])]
                        (if (seq children)
                          (cons root
                                (->> children
                                     (sort-by #(not= root (first %)))
                                     (map #(get-other root %))
                                     (map #(make-tree remaining %))))
                          [root])))]
      (make-tree (vec (tree-to-tuples tree)) new-root)
      ))

(fn [new-root tree]
  (letfn [(one-up [tree node]
            (let [     root (first tree)
                  one-down (rest tree)
                  node-tree (first (filter #(= node (first %)) one-down))
                  sans-node (remove #(= node (first %)) one-down)
                  root-tree (cons root sans-node)]
              (concat node-tree (list root-tree))))
          (path-to [tree node]
            (let [root (first tree)]
              (cond
               (nil? root) nil
               (= node root) (list root)
               :else (let [path (first
                                 (keep #(if % %)
                                       (for [branch (rest tree)]
                                         (path-to branch node))))]
                       (if path (conj path root))))))]
    (let [rotations (rest (path-to tree new-root))]
      (loop [rots rotations
             tree tree]
        (if (empty? rots) tree
            (recur (rest rots) (one-up tree (first rots))))))))

(fn [name tree]
  (letfn [(path-to-nodes [[node & childs] name]
            (if (= node name)
              (list (list node))
              (when (seq childs)
                (map (fn [n] (when n (cons node n)))
                     (mapcat (fn [child] (path-to-nodes child name)) childs)))))
          (reparent-node [[node & childs] [hn & tn]]
            (if-let [[new-root & new-root-childs] (first (filter (fn [[n & cs]] (= n (first tn))) childs))]
              (let [new-childs (remove (fn [[n & cs]] (= n (first tn))) childs)]
                [(cons new-root
                       (concat new-root-childs
                               (list (cons node new-childs)))) tn])
              [(cons node childs) tn]))
          (reparent-tree [tree names]
            (if (seq names)
              (let [[new-tree new-names] (reparent-node tree names)]
                (reparent-tree new-tree new-names))
              tree))]
    (reparent-tree tree (first (path-to-nodes tree name)))))

(letfn [(find-node [name z] 
          (if (= name (clojure.zip/node z))
            (clojure.zip/up z)
            (recur name (clojure.zip/next z))))
        (new-tree [z]
          (-> z clojure.zip/node clojure.zip/seq-zip))
        (parent-name [z]
          (-> z clojure.zip/up ffirst))
        (parent-tree [z]
          (-> z clojure.zip/remove clojure.zip/root clojure.zip/seq-zip))
        (pull-up [z]
          (if-let [pn (parent-name z)]
            (clojure.zip/node (clojure.zip/append-child (new-tree z)
                                                        (->> (parent-tree z)
                                                             (find-node pn)
                                                             pull-up)))
            (clojure.zip/node z)))]
  (fn [name tree]
    (->> (clojure.zip/seq-zip tree)
         (find-node name)
         pull-up)))

(letfn [(pull [root child] 
          (concat child [(remove #{child} root)]))
        (paths [root] 
          (tree-seq 
            (comp seq? :node) 
            (fn [m] (for [child (rest (:node m))] 
                      {:node child :path (conj (:path m) (:node m))}))
            {:node root :path []})) 
        (find-node [id root]
          (some #(when (= id (-> % :node first)) %) (paths root)))]
  (fn [id root]
    (reduce pull (apply conj ((juxt :path :node) (find-node id root))))))

(fn [new-root tree]
   (letfn [(pull-node* [current [[parent-node & parent-children] & rest-ancestors :as ancestors]]
             (if (empty? ancestors)
               current
               (concat current
                       [(pull-node* (cons parent-node
                                          (filter #(not (= (first current) (first %)))
                                                  parent-children))
                                    rest-ancestors)])))
           (pull-node [[current-node & current-children :as current] ancestors]
             (cond (= new-root current-node) (pull-node* current ancestors)
                   (empty? current-children) nil
                   :else (some #(pull-node % (cons current ancestors)) current-children)))]
     (pull-node tree ())))

(fn [n [l & _ :as t]]
  (if (= l n)
    t
    (let [r (loop [cl (clojure.zip/zipper (fn [_] true) next (fn [[l & _] c] `(~l ~@c)) t)]
              (let [[l & _ :as c] (clojure.zip/node cl)]
                (if (= l n)
                  `[~@(clojure.zip/path cl) ~c]
                  (recur (clojure.zip/next cl)))))]
      (reduce
       (fn [[l & c] s]
         `(~@s (~l ~@(filter #(not= s %) c))))
       r))))

(letfn
  [(tree-iterate
     ([tree] (tree-iterate tree nil))
     ([tree parent]
      (if-let [[node & subtrees] tree]
        (cons [parent node subtrees]
              (apply concat (map #(tree-iterate % node) subtrees))))))
   (simplify-tree [tree]
     (apply merge
            (for [[parent node subtrees] (tree-iterate tree)]
              {node (concat (map first subtrees) (if parent [parent]))})))
   (hang-subtree [simplified root parent]
     (cons root
           (for [child (simplified root)
                 :when (not= child parent)]
             (hang-subtree simplified child root))))]
  (fn [new-root tree]
    (hang-subtree (simplify-tree tree) new-root nil)))

            (= 1 (count tree)) nil
            :else
              (first
                (filter #(not= % nil)
                  (for [child (rest tree)]
                    (node-path target child (conj current (first tree)))
                  )
                )
              )
          )        
      )]
    (loop [
           new-tree tree 
           root (first new-tree)

        (empty? path) new-tree

        :else

               ]
            
              ;(println new-root)

              (recur
                (cond
                  (empty? not-in-path-subtrees) (seq (concat [new-root] in-path-subtree [(seq [root])]))
                  (empty? in-path-subtree) (seq (concat [new-root] [(concat [root] not-in-path-subtrees)]))
                  :else
                    (seq (concat [new-root] in-path-subtree [(concat [root] not-in-path-subtrees)] ))
                )
                (first path)
                (rest path)
              )
            
          )
            
      )

)

(fn [i t]
	(let [tree-find (fn tf [nr [p & c :as t]]
		(if (= p nr)
			[nil [t]]
			(if (seq c)
				(let [nc (map #(tf nr %) c)
					  found? (some seq (map second nc))]
					  (if (not found?)
						[t []]
						(let [nt (concat [p] (remove nil? (map first nc)))
							  np (first (remove nil? (remove nil? (map second nc))))]
							[nil (conj np nt)])))
				[t nil])))
			first-pass (tree-find i t)]
		(reduce #(conj (vec %2) %1) (reverse (second first-pass)))))

(fn trp [p tree]
  (let [tm (vec ((fn re-tree [p t]
                   (if (empty? t) {}
                       (let [ft (first t)]
                         (reduce #(merge %1 (re-tree ft %2))
                                 {ft p} (rest t)))))
                 nil tree))]
    (->> (loop [tm tm, p p]
           (let [[tm np] (reduce (fn [[a np] [x y]]
                                   (cond (= x np) [(conj a [y x]) y]
                                         :else [(conj a [x y]) np]))
                                 [[] p] tm)]
             (if (nil? np) tm
                 (recur tm np))))
         (filter #((comp not nil? first) %))
         ((fn [tm]
            ((fn make-list [p]
               (->> (filter #(= p (second %)) tm)
                    (sort-by first)
                    (map (comp make-list first))
                    (sort-by (comp count flatten))
                    (reduce conj [p]))) p)
            )))))

(fn f [r t]
  (letfn [(subt [r t]
            (if (= r (first t))
              t
              (some #(subt r %) (rest t))))

          (parent [r t]
            (if (= r (first t))
              nil
              (when (not-empty t)
                (if-let [a (some #(= r (first %)) (rest t))]
                  (first t)
                  (some #(parent r %) (rest t))))))

          (disjt [r t]
            (if (= r (first t))
              nil
              (cons (first t) (keep #(disjt r %) (rest t)))))]

    (if (= r (first t))
      t
      (let [sub (subt r t)]
        (concat sub
                [(f (parent r t) (disjt r t))])))))

(letfn [(tree->net [tree parent] 
                   (conj
   					(mapcat #(tree->net % (first tree)) (rest tree))
   					(list (first tree) (let [ntree (mapv first (rest tree))]
                                         (if parent (conj ntree parent) ntree)))))
        (net->tree [net root]
                   (when-let [children (some #(when (= root (first %)) (second %)) net)]
    				(conj (remove nil? (map (fn [c] (net->tree (remove #(= root (first %)) net) c)) children)) root)))]
  (fn [root tree] 
    (net->tree (tree->net tree nil) root)))

(fn [my-value my-tree]
      (letfn [(convert
                [tree]
                {:value (keyword (first tree)) :children (into [] (map convert (rest tree)))})
              (unconvert
                [converted-tree]
                (let [value (symbol (name (:value converted-tree))) children (map unconvert (:children converted-tree))]
                  (cons value children)))
              (find-node [tree value]
                (do
                  (cond
                    (= value (:value tree)) tree
                    (empty? (:children tree)) nil
                    :else
                    (let [results (map (fn [child-node] (find-node child-node value)) (:children tree))]
                      (first (remove nil? results))
                      ))))
              (find-parent-node [tree value]
                (cond
                  (some #(= value (:value %))
                        (:children tree))
                  tree
                  :else
                  (first
                    (map (fn [child-node] (find-parent-node child-node value)) (:children tree)))))
              (find-addtl-child [tree value]
                (if (= (:value tree) value)
                  nil
                  (loop [current-node (find-parent-node tree value) previous-node (find-node tree value)]
                    (cond
                      (and
                        (= current-node tree)
                        (= (:value previous-node) value))
                      current-node
                      (= current-node tree) previous-node
                      :else
                      (recur
                        (find-parent-node tree (:value current-node))
                        current-node)))))
              (remove-node [tree value]
                (if (= (:value tree) value)
                  nil
                  (if-let [p (first (filter #(= value (:value %)) (:children tree)))]
                    {:value (:value tree) :children (into [] (remove #{p} (:children tree)))}

                    (if (not (:children tree))
                      tree
                      {:value (:value tree) :children (map #(remove-node % value) (:children tree))})
                    )
                  ))]

        (unconvert
          (let [converted-tree (convert my-tree) v (keyword my-value)]
            (if (= v (:value converted-tree))
              converted-tree
              (let [
                    new-parent (find-node converted-tree v)
                    addtl-child (find-addtl-child converted-tree v)]

                (let [converted-result

                      {:value v :children (conj (:children new-parent)
                                                (let [addtl (remove-node addtl-child v)]
                                                  {:value (:value addtl) :children (remove nil? (conj
                                                                                                  (:children addtl)
                                                                                                  (remove-node converted-tree (:value addtl))))}))}]
                  converted-result
                  ))
              )
            ))
        ))

(fn [new-root-name root]

            (cond

                                                      (rest node))
              :else (ascend parents-stack node)))
          (ascend [[p & parents-stack] node]
            (if (nil? p)
              node
              (concat node [(ascend parents-stack
                                    (cons (first p)
                                          (filter #(not= (first %) (first node)) (rest p))))])))]
    (into [] (descend [] root))))

              (if (= target name)

                (some identity (map (partial find-node target (conj path node)) children))))
            (simplify [[f & r] path]
              (if (nil? r)
                (conj path (vec f))
                (recur r (conj path (vec (remove #{(first r)} f))))))]
      (reduce #(conj %2 %1)
              (simplify (find-node target [] top) [])))))

(fn reparent-tree [new-root tree]
  (let [path-to-new-root (fn path-to-new-root [[root & children]] 
                           (cond 
                             (= root new-root)  (list root)
                             children           (cons root
                                                      (->> children
                                                           (map path-to-new-root)
                                                           (remove nil?)
                                                           first))))
        reparent (fn [new-root [root & children]]
                   (let [{new-children false 
                          [[_ & new-root-node-children]] true} (group-by (comp boolean #{new-root} first) 
                                                                         children)]
                     (apply list new-root 
                       (concat new-root-node-children 
                               (list (apply list root new-children))))))]
    (->> [(rest (path-to-new-root tree)) tree]
         (iterate (fn [[[next-node & remaining] tree]]
                    (when next-node
                      [remaining (reparent next-node tree)])))
         (take-while (complement nil?))
         last
         second)))

(fn reparent [node tree]
  (letfn [
          (sub-tree [node tree]
                    (if (= (first tree) node) tree
                      (first (filter identity (map #(sub-tree node %) (rest tree))))))
          (remove-sub-tree [sub-tree tree]
            (if (some #(= sub-tree %) (rest tree)) 
              (filter #(not= sub-tree %) tree)
              (cons (first tree) (map #(remove-sub-tree sub-tree %) (rest tree)))
              )
            )
          (parent [node tree]
            (if (some #(= node (first %)) (rest tree))
              (first tree)
              (first (filter identity (map #(parent node %) (rest tree))))))
          ]
  (if (= node (first tree)) tree
    (let [new-root (sub-tree node tree)
          parent-of-root (parent node tree)
          remaining-tree (reparent parent-of-root (remove-sub-tree new-root tree))
          ]
      (concat new-root (list remaining-tree)))
  )))

(fn pro
 ([x t] (pro x t  (into {} (cons [t nil] (for [n (rest t)] [n t])))))
 ([x t pm]
  (let [r  (if (coll? t) (first t) t) 
        c  (if (coll? t) (rest t) nil)]
     (if (= x r)
        (let [pt (pm t) gpt (pm pt)]
           (if pt 
               (let [d (fn [T n] (cons (first T) 
                                         (remove #(= n %) (rest T))))
                     gpp (if gpt (d gpt pt) nil)
                     pp  (d pt t)
                     pp2 (if gpp 
                             (conj (vec pp) gpp)
                             pp)
                     xp (conj (vec t) pp2)]
                   (pro x xp (assoc pm xp (pm gpt))))
               t))
        (if c
           (loop [[n & q] c]
              (if n
                (if-let [rz (pro x n 
                                 (if (coll? n)
                                     (into {} (concat pm (for [j (rest n)] [j n])))
                                     pm))]
                    rz
                    (recur q)))))))))

(fn re-tree [n t]
  (letfn [(map-tree ([t] (apply hash-map (map-tree nil t)))  
                    ([p [n & c]]
                    (if c
                      (conj 
                        (mapcat (partial map-tree n) c) 
                        (filter (comp not nil?) (conj (mapv first c) p))
                        n)
                      [n (list p)])))
          (re-tree-map [m n]
            (if (empty? m) []
              (when-let [cs (get m n)]
                (conj 
                  (concat 
                    (map
                      #(re-tree-map (dissoc m n) %)
                      (filter m cs)))
                  n))))]
  (re-tree-map (map-tree t) n)))

(fn reparent-tree [n tree]
  {:pre [(pos? (count tree))]}
  (letfn [(target-root [tree] (when (= n (first tree)) tree))
          (mk-tree [v children] (cons v children))
          (append-root [[target & target-children] root-tree root-child?]
            (if (root-child? target)
              (concat target-children [root-tree])
              (concat (butlast target-children)
                      [(mk-tree (first (last target-children))
                                (append-root (last target-children) root-tree root-child?))])))]
    (let [[root & original-children] tree
          root-children (map #(reparent-tree n %) original-children)
          target-tree (some target-root root-children)
          root-tree (mk-tree root (remove target-root root-children))
          root-child? (set (map first original-children))]
      (assert (or (nil? target-tree) (target-root target-tree)))
      (if (and
            (not (target-root tree))
            (seq root-children)
            (seq target-tree))
        (mk-tree n (append-root target-tree root-tree root-child?))
        tree))))

(fn [newroot tree]
  (let [move-down
        (fn [[tree zipper]]
          (if-not (empty? (rest tree))
            (list (first (rest tree))
                  {:name (first tree)
                   :left '()
                   :right (rest (rest tree))
                   :zipper zipper})))
        move-up
        (fn [[tree zipper]]
          (if-not (empty? zipper)
            (list (cons (zipper :name)
                        (reverse (cons tree (zipper :left))))
                  (zipper :zipper))))
        move-right
        (fn [[tree zipper]]
          (if-not (empty? (zipper :right))
            (list (first (zipper :right))
                  (assoc zipper
                         :left (cons tree (zipper :left))
                         :right (rest (zipper :right))))))
        search
        (fn [x]
          (if (= newroot (first (first x)))
            x
            (if-let [x (move-down x)]
              (recur x)
              (if-let [x (move-right x)]
                (recur x)
                (recur (->> x
                            (iterate move-up)
                            (drop-while (comp nil? move-right))
                            first
                            move-right))))))
        add-right
        (fn [root child]
          (if (nil? child) root
              (if (nil? root) child
                  (->> root reverse (cons child) reverse))))
        construct
        (fn [zip] (cons (zip :name) (concat (reverse (zip :left)) (zip :right))))
        parse
        (fn [tree zipper]
          (let [aux (fn [tree zips]
                      (if (empty? (first zips))
                        tree
                        (recur (add-right tree (construct (first zips)))
                               (rest zips))))]
            (add-right tree (aux nil (iterate :zipper zipper)))))]
    (apply parse (search (list tree {})))))

(fn [pivot tree]
  (let [branch-root-pivot (first (filter #(-> % first (= pivot)) (tree-seq coll? next tree)))
        branch-inicial-com-pivot (filter #(-> (flatten %) set (contains? pivot)) (next tree))
        branch-inicial-sem-pivot (first (remove #(-> (flatten %) set (contains? pivot)) (next tree)))
        branch-primeiro (remove #(if (coll? %) (-> % first (= pivot)) (= pivot %)) (first branch-inicial-com-pivot))
        branch-segundo (when (not= pivot (first tree)) 
                         (cons (first tree) (when branch-inicial-sem-pivot (list branch-inicial-sem-pivot))))]
    (concat branch-root-pivot
            (if (seq branch-primeiro)
              (list (concat branch-primeiro
                            (list branch-segundo)))
              (when branch-segundo (list branch-segundo))))))

    (let [to-m (fn f [par i n & chs] (merge {n [par i]} (apply merge (map #(apply (partial f n %2) %1) chs (range)))))

                                              (sort-by #(get-in % [1 1]))
                                              (map first))]
                      (cons n (map #(f % m) chs))))

          tr (fn f [v m] (let [p (get (m v) 0)] (if p (assoc (f p m) p [v (/ 1.0 0.0)]) m)))]
  (from-m v (dissoc (tr v m) v)) ))

        remprev (fn [i] (remove #(= % (nth allp (dec' i))) (nth allp i)))

(fn yank [r tree]
  (letfn [(subtree [r tree]
            (cond (empty? tree) nil
                  (= (first tree) r) tree
                  :else
                  (first (filter seq
                                 (map 
                                  (partial subtree r)
                                  (rest tree))))))
          (crop [r tree]
            (cond (empty? tree) '()
                  (= (first tree) r) '()
                  :else (cons (first tree) (filter seq (map (partial crop r) (rest tree))))))
          (path [r tree]
            (cond (empty? tree) nil
                  (= (first tree) r) (list r)
                  :else (let [q (filter identity (mapv (partial path r) (rest tree)))]
                          (if (empty? q) nil
                              (conj (first q) (first tree))))))
          (append [r tree2 tree1]
            (cond (empty? tree1) tree1
                  (= (first tree1) r) (concat tree1 (list tree2))
                  :else (cons (first tree1) (map (partial append r tree2) (rest tree1)))))]
    
    (reduce
     (fn [t r]
       (let [c (crop r t)]
         (if (empty? c)
           (subtree r t)
           (append r (crop r t) (subtree r t)))))
     tree
     (path r tree))))

                  (if (= node (node-name tree))
